texts.en: Apisa is 51 years old, married and has five children. The eldest son is married and living separately, two children are college students, and the youngest are elementary school age. Apisa has a secondary education and her neighbors describe her as a kind and hardworking woman. As the main source of income for her family, Apisa has engaged in farming and raising livestock for 25 years. Apisa started her business with 30,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, she was able to develop and expand the business, which currently brings in about 22,000 som (KGS) per month.  This income provides for food and household needs for the family. Also, Apisa and her spouse have been raising livestock in order to supplement the family's income for many years. The farm has one dairy cow and one horse. Apisa has .65 hectares of land and and 2.0 hectares of rented land where Apisa grows potatoes, corn, red peppers and tomatoes. In order to further grow her business, Apisa has turned to to the Bank " Bai-Tushum " for a loan for the purchase of potato seeds, fertilizer, and tilling the soil. Apisa plans to invest the loan income to further grow the business, and hopes to save money in the future for her daughter's wedding.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Marcela Yasmin

texts.es:
Marcela de 23 años de edad, es una persona con excelentes principios morales, los que la han llevado a ser una mujer muy reconocida en su lugar de residencia , ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar además los fines de semana hace pan y pupusas para vender y a diario se dedica a la venta de tortillas.

La Joven Marcela vive y se a creció junto a sus padres, quienes son  personas muy humildes y trabajadoras que también se dedicaban a la venta de tortillas, pan y pupusas, su familia contaba con 3 hermanos siendo ella la menor de todos a quien le correspondía ayudar en los quehaceres del hogar y en las ventas del negocio de su familia, ya que sus otros dos hermanos ya son independientes y viven lejos de sus padres,  por esa razón se le hizo difícil completar sus estudios de educación media alcanzando únicamente hasta 9º grado, trascurrió el tiempo y con una edad adecuada conoció al que ahora es su esposo que se dedica a la agricultura y excavación de pozos, con quien  son padres de 1 niña de 3 años, ellos viven en casa de los padres de Marcela  


La Joven se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar, con una experiencia de 10 años, actividad que aprendió de sus padres y los fines de semana se dedica a la venta de pan y pupusas y los demás días de semana se dedica a la venta de tortillas realizando estas actividades lleva más de 5 años y continuara haciéndolo, ya que se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos de donde les proporciona ganancias para satisfacer las necesidades básicas de su hogar y poder cubrir con gastos de medicamentos de su madre,  ya que padece de insuficiencia renal y se encuentra en un tratamiento.

El dinero será utilizado para la compra del tratamiento de medicamentos de su madre, ya que se acerca la fecha de su chequeo médico y la compra de los medicamentos, de esta forma está garantizando la salud y la pronta recuperación de su madre 

Las sueños y metas que la joven tiene para un futuro son las de haber terminado de pagar el préstamo y hacer una nueva solicitud para montar una venta de comida que funcione de lunes a viernes, esto lo hará con ayuda de su madre ya que tiene la fé que su condición de salud mejorara en cuento a su hija apoyarlos hasta que finalicen sus estudios universitarios, ya que manifiesta que su hija quiere ser enfermera. y todo esto lo va lograr con ayuda del préstamo y la inversión de sus ganancias
texts.en:
Marcela, age 23, is a person with excellent moral values that have made her a very well-known woman where she lives.  She devotes herself to the household chores.  On the week-ends she makes bread and ‘pupusas’ [thick corn tortillas that are stuffed with cheese, beans and/or pork and cooked on a griddle] to sell.  She sells tortillas daily.

Marcela grew up with her parents, and she lives with them.  They are very humble and hard-working people who also sell tortillas, bread, and pupusas.  There are three siblings in her family, and she is the youngest.  It falls to her to help with the household chores and with the sales in the family business.  Her two other siblings are independent and live far from their parents.  That is the reason that it was hard for her to complete her education, which she had partially completed.  She only went to school through the ninth grade.  

As time passed, and when she was old enough, she met the man who is now her husband.  He devotes himself to agriculture and digging wells.  They have a three year old daughter, and they live in Marcela’s parents’ house.

This young woman devotes herself to the household chores, and she has ten years of experience.  She learned this activity from her parents.  On the week-ends she sells bread and pupusas.  The other days of the week she sells tortillas.  She has been doing this for over five years, and she will continue to do so.  This is because it has become her main source of income to meet the basic needs of her household and to be able to cover her mother’s medication expenses.  Her mother suffers from renal insufficiency, and she is receiving treatment.

She will use the money to buy medication used for treatment for her mother.  The date of her medical check-up and medication purchase is approaching.  This way, her mother’s health and quick recuperation will be assured.

This young woman’s dreams and goals for the future are to have finished repaying the loan and to make a new request in order to set up food sales on Mondays through Fridays.  She will do this with her mother’s help.  

She has faith that her health condition will improve.  The mother will support the daughter until she completes her university studies.  She states that her daughter wants to become a nurse.  She will achieve all of this with the help of the loan and the investment of their earnings.

loans.use: to pay for her mother's medical treatment.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en: Clarita is a 61-year-old, married mother of one adult, and presently residing in La Union, La Libertad.  She has been engaged in agriculture business for three years.  She joined Paglaum in 2013 with a monthly income of PHP 6,000 from that business.  She applied for a loan to pay for land preparation and to buy fertilizer.  She will use the profits she earns from the business for retirement savings.

loans.use: to pay for land preparation and to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Aurora

texts.en: Aurora is 59 years old and married with nine children. With children in school, Aurora works very hard to provide for them. She buys and sells charcoal in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell. Aurora has been in this business for two years. In the future, Aurora would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Christy

texts.en: Christy works hard to support her family. Christy is married and has a restaurant business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like fish, vegetables, spices, etc.  Christy has been in this business for two years now. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell like fish, vegetables, spices, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, wood, flour, sugar and cosmetics

loans.name: Elena

texts.en: Elena works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy and sell rice grains business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell. Elena has been in this business for eight years now. In the future, Elena would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Nonato

texts.en:
Nonato is thankful for the financial assistance extended to him. He was able to buy the needed spare parts for his tricycle. His loan helped not just in his business, but also in their everyday household expenses. They are working hard to provide for their everyday needs. He also has a jeepney and sells doormats for additional income.
 
He would like to apply for another 15,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts, and for the maintenance of their Jeepney unit. He will also use his loan for the maintenance of his tricycle unit. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain his family's daily needs. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart.

Nonato hopes that his business will continue to flourish and dreams to have a better living. He meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his life and business every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and from Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of his jeepney unit and his tricycle unit.

loans.name: Ty's Group

texts.en: Ty resides in Dambae district of Kampong Cham province. Ty is 21 years old and single. She strives for a living from cassava and rice farming. She has been occupied in this business for three years. Now, she is able to earn up to 26,400 KHR. This is not the first loan cycle for Ty with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) with successful repayment. For this cycle, she teams up in a group of three to get a new loan. She and one of her co-borrowers are seeking 2,000,000 KHR each, while another joint borrower is applying for 500,000 KHR. As the group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for plowing fees, to buy fertilizer, to pay for labor costs, and to buy insecticide. She hopes to gain a good yield, better than before, so that she can improve her living condition in a gradual pace.

loans.use: to pay for plowing fees, to buy fertilizer, to pay for labor costs, and to buy insecticide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and pay for the cost of labour

loans.name: Mahsuna

texts.ru: Махсуна добрая, жизнерадостная, целеустремленная и старательная женщина в возрасте 22 лет. Она замужем, но на данный момент не имеет детей. Она проживает со своим супругом в сельской местности Дж.Рассуловского района. Махсуна с раннего возраста занимается разведением КРС. Она любит свою работу и старается расширить свой бизнес и количество скота.Муж Махсуны занимается строительством и по сезону ездит в Российскую Федерацию на заработки, остальное время занимается строительством на родине. Махсуна хочет получить кредит для развития своего бизнеса. Для того чтоб в дальнейшем иметь возможность обеспечивать свою семью. Дать своим будущим детям образование и возможность начать своё дело. Махсуна заранее благодарна Арванду за предоставление финансовой помощи.
texts.en: Mahsuna is a kind, cheerful, goal-driven and industrious 22-year-old woman. She is married but she does not yet have children. She lives with her husband in the countryside of the J. Rasulov District. From an early age, Mahsuna has been raising cattle. She loves her work and strives to expand her business and her number of cattle. Mahsuna's husband works in construction. He seasonally works abroad in the Russian Federation, the rest of the time he works in the construction sector in Tajikistan. Mahsuna wants to receive a loan to develop her business so that in the future she will have the opportunity to provide for her family. She wants to give her future children an education and the opportunity to start their own pursuits. Mahsuna thanks Arvand in advance for their granting of financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Tsogtbaatar

texts.en:
Tsogtbaatar, 30 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They live in a slum district. He has been rendering taxi service to local people since 2012. His wife sells food stuffs at trade center. 

The house they live in has been deteriorating over the years, so he is requesting a loan of 1,900,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement, and plans. After renovation, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and fewer pollutants will be released into air.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Milagros Suzet

texts.es:
Milagros es una joven de 20 años de edad, trabaja como mesera en un restaurante de la ciudad desde hace un año y con el fruto de su humilde empleo puede solventar los gastos de sus estudios, ya que actualmente cursa la carrera de Computación e informática en un IST de su ciudad; Milagros cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es amable con los clientes.

Milagros esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracia a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá solventar los gastos para poder obtener sus título profesional; asi ella podrá tener mejores oportunidades para poder copnseguir un mejor empleo y poder seguir luchando para hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener un buen empleo y tener un negocio propio”.
texts.en:
Milagros is a young woman of 20 who has been working as a waitress in a restaurant in the city for one year. With the earnings from this humble position she has been able to cover the cost of her studies. She is currently undertaking a course in Computing and Information Technology at an institute in her city. Milagro believes that she is good at her job because she is friendly to the customers.

Milagros is grateful to the Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, they have allowed her to cover her fees so that she can obtain a professional qualification. This will open up greater opportunities to her to get a better job and continue working towards making her dream a reality: “to have a good job and my own business”.

loans.use: to pay the fees of a professional qualification

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is 47 years old, married and the mother of four school-aged children. She lives in La Union, La Libertad, Zamboanga Del Norte, where she works as a farmer and earns a promising income of PHP 6,000 per month.  She joined the Paglaum MPC last year, and has applied for a loan to buy fertilizer for her vegetables. The profit she earns from this loan will allow her to set aside money to send her four children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 52 years old and married with six children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Elizabeth is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Elizabeth has been raising pigs for 10 years and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
En San Jacinto  del cantón Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros,  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.
Aquí vive la señora María, tiene 43 años  de edad, es madre soltera de una  hija de 17 años que se graduó del colegio y espera seguir los estudios universitarios. Ella vive sola con su hija y el marido de esta ya que su hija ya está comprometida. 
Doña María es una mujer que le gusta salir adelante a base de esfuerzo y trabajo, hace ya casi dos años puso un bar y cafetería en un local en la vía principal lugar por el cual pasan muchas personas que se dirigen a bahía de Caraquez, en su local sirve las delicias que ella prepara, allí su hija le ayuda cuando puede, le está yendo muy bien con este negocio el cual le permite salir adelante. 
Este crédito es para comprar viveres necesarios para prepara los platos. Lleva tres años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son de gran ayuda para ella.  Sus sueños son tener un local propio y bonito.
texts.en:
Every fortnight, the Bankito La Y communal bank meet in San Jacinto, located in the Tosagua canton. This area is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited by many national and international visitors. The area offers a diversity of beautiful places and a rich variety of traditional meals from the region.  

This is where Maria lives. She is 43 years old and a single mother to a 17 year old daughter who has graduated from secondary school and is waiting to continue her university studies. Maria lives with her daughter and her daughter’s fiancé now that her daughter is engaged.  

María is a woman who likes to get ahead through effort and hard work. Two years ago now she set up a bar and cafe in a store on the main road, an area where many people pass on their way to Caraquez bay. In this store she serves up delicious meals which she prepares and her daughter helps her out when she can. This business is going very well for her and it allows her to get ahead in life. 

This loan will be used to buy necessary ingredients to prepare her dishes. Maria has been with her communal bank for three years and she likes it because the loans are of great use to her. Her dream is to have her own attractive store.

loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: Wilber Alexander

texts.es:
Wilber de 27 años de edad,  es una persona con excelentes principios morales y espirituales, muy dedicado al servicio a los demás, Wilber se creció con sus padres que se dedicaban a la agricultura y a la prestación de servicios de trasporte con un microbús y fueron sus padres los que le inculcaron esos valores que son los que lo han llevado a salir adelante y a ser una persona de bien, él ayudaba a su padre a los trabajos agrícolas por las mañanas y por la tarde se dedicaba a estudiar en la escuela y así fue como logro alcanzar sus estudios de 9º grado en la escuela nacional.

Con el paso del tiempo adquirió mucha experiencia y conocimientos sobre la agricultura y prestación de servicio de trasporte y comenzó a trabajar a tiempo completo con su padre, fue así como se fue independizando y conoció con quien decidió acompañarse y ahora son padres de 2 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando educación básica en la escuela.

Wilber cuenta con una experiencia de 15 años en trabajos de agricultura y trasporte ya que fue una actividad que  aprendió de su padre quien le heredo el microbús, con el que actualmente continua trabajando motivado por las ganancias y por el compromiso que tiene de dar lo mejor a su familia y los días que no hay trabajo con el microbús se dedica a los cultivos de maíz y frijoles de los cuales le sirven para llevar el sustento diario a su familia, los días que más se dedica a la prestación de servicio son los días sábados y domingos días en los que trasporta personas a los diferentes cantones y caseríos personas que salen de compras al mercado.


El dinero será utilizado en reparación de la trasmisión del microbús, ya que ya que últimamente ha tenido una buena demanda por parte de los usuarios de servicios y con las reparaciones y ajustes que le haga al microbús podrá prestar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo que le generara más ganancias que posteriormente serán invertidas en solventar las necesidades básicas de su hogar  



Las proyecciones que tiene para el futuro son las de haber cancelado el préstamo y adquirir uno de mayor monto para la compra de una nueva unidad de trasporte, ya que con la que cuenta actualmente se está presentando algunas dificultades debido a que ya está viejo, y apoyara a su hijos en la educación hasta que sean unos profesionales de éxito.
texts.en:
Wilber, age 27, is a person with excellent moral and spiritual values.  He is very dedicated to the service of others.  Wilber grew up with his parents, and they were dedicated to agriculture and providing transportation services with a minibus.  It was his parents who instilled in him these values that have gotten him ahead and have made him become a good person.  He helped his father with the farming work in the mornings.  In the afternoons he went to school.  This was how he managed to complete his education through the ninth grade at the national school.

As time passed he acquired a lot of experience and knowledge about agriculture and providing transportation service.  He started working full time with his father.  This is how he was becoming independent.  He met the person with whom he decided to have a relationship, and they now have two children who attend elementary school.

Wilber has 15 years of experience with agricultural work and transportation.  He learned this business activity from his father from whom he inherited the minibus.  He currently continues working with it.  He is motivated by the earnings and by the commitment that he has to give the best to his family.  On the days that there is no work with the minibus, he works on the corn and bean crops.  They serve to bring home the daily bread to his family.  The days that he works more providing service are Saturdays and Sundays.  On those days he transports people to different cantons and neighborhoods and people who are going to shop at the market.

He will use the money to repair the transmission in the minibus.  Lately there has been a good demand for his services.  With the repairs and adjustments that he will make to the minibus, he will be able to provide better service to his customers.  That will generate more earnings that will later be invested in paying for the basic necessities of his household.

The plans that he has for the future are to repay the loan and to get a greater amount to buy a new vehicle for transportation.  The one that he currently has is presenting some problems because it is old.  He will also support his children’s education until they become successful professionals.

loans.use: to repair the transmission in the minibus.

loans.name: Channa's Group

texts.en:
Channa is a rural villager from Kampong Cham province and she is 38 years old. She is a married mother and blessed with four schoolchildren. 

To feed her family, she grows rice as the main source of income.  She also earns extra income via bean planting and her husband has an occupation as a musician for fee. Engaged with this business for 20 years, she is able to earn up 22,200 KHR per day. 

This is the second-time loan for her with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she is a leader of a group consisting of four members. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy bean seeds and to pay for plowing cost. She hopes this business will enable her to support her kids to study to reach a higher level.

loans.use: To buy bean seeds and to pay for plowing cost

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda is 48 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Gilda has been in this business for 29 years.  She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en: Elsie is married, the mother of four children and a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 65 years old and works hard to make it possible for her children to attend school. Elsie earns a living by selling used clothing in the Philippines, and has requested a PHP 13,000 loan from NWTF to buy additional items to sell. She has been in this business for 16 years, and would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell

loans.name: Makhsuda

texts.ru:
Махсуда жизнерадостная и ответственная женщина. Она живёт в небольшом сельском посёлке. Живёт она о своим мужем и детьми в небольшом доме. Она очень хорошая хозяйка, в её доме всегда царит чистота и красота. Для своей семьи она делает всё возможное, чтобы они жили в достатке и ни в чём не нуждались. 

Махсуда вот уже несколько лет сотрудничает с Арванд. Она впервые брала кредит на потребительские нужды. Вот и сейчас также обратилась для получения кредита на потребительскую нужду. Сейчас Махсуда вместе со своим мужем обустраивает свой дом, в котором они живут, чтобы его детям и внукам было комфортно там жить.  Сама Махсуда работает портнихой на дому, она шьёт национальную одежду для женщин. А муж Махсуды работает в России. Сейчас Махсуда хочет закупить комфортную мебель в дом. Но у нее сейчас не достаточно средств, чтобы закупить необходимую мебель.  Поэтому Махсуда обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку мебели. Она заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Makhsuda is a cheerful and responsible woman. She lives in a tiny country village. She lives with her husband and children in a small house. She is a very good homemaker - cleanliness and beauty always reign in her house. She does everything she can for her family so that they live comfortably and do not want for anything.

Makhsuda has partnered with Arvand for several years already. She first took out a loan for consumer goods. Now she is also requesting a loan for consumer goods. Currently, Makhsuda and her husband are renovating their home where they live so that their children and grandchildren can live comfortably there. Makhsuda works as a seamstress from home. She sews ethnic Tajik women's clothing. Makhsuda's husband works in Russia. Now Makhsuda wants to buy comfortable furniture for her house. However, she does not have enough money to buy the necessary furniture. This is why Makhsuda requested a loan from Arvand to buy furniture. She thanks Arvand in advance for their support and relies on a positive outcome.

loans.use: to buy furniture.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina is married and works hard to support her family by buying and selling rice in the Philippines. She has requested a loan for PHP 18,000 from NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell. She has been in this line of work for five years and her goal for the future is to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Sok Un's Group

texts.en: A villager from the Koh Sotin district of Kampong Cham province, Sok Un is a single woman who is 39 years old. Her main sources of income are from maize, sesame, and tobacco planting. This is a first-time loan for Sok Un and the other member of her loan group, and they are requesting 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she is planning to use her portion of the loan to pay for workers to help on her farm. Her goal is to improve her lifestyle from its current level.

loans.use: to pay for workers to help on her farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for more LPG tanks for her business.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is 48 years old, married and the mother of one child who is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur who buys and sells generic medicines in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan from NWTF to buy more boxes of medicines to sell. Jocelyn has been in this business for two years, and her goal for the future is to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of generic medicines

loans.name: Oybek

texts.ru:
Ойбек жизнерадостный и позитивный парень в возрасте 27 лет. Он родился и вырос в кишлаке. Он женат и имеет двоих детей.  С самого детства Ойбек обучен делу, которым занимался его отец. Это животноводство. Это дело является приемлемым, особенно для людей, которые живут в сельской местности и кишлаках. Этот вид деятельности приносит в таких местностях доход, который помогает людям выживать.

Вот и Ойбек сейчас занимается этим делом. Животноводство и земледелие - это его основное дело, которое приносит ему доход. Но сейчас Ойбек обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку авиабилета своему родственнику, который собирается на заработки в Россию. Своих денежных средств у него не достаточно, поэтому Ойбек очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Oybek is a cheerful and positive 27-year-old guy. He was born and raised in a small village. He is married and has two children. From childhood, Oybek learned the trade which his father worked in - livestock breeding. This is an agreeable business, especially for people who live in the countryside and small villages. This type of work brings an income to these kinds of locations, which helps people to survive.

Now Oybek practices this trade. Livestock breeding and crop farming are his main businesses which bring him an income. However, Oybek requested a loan from Arvand to buy an airline ticket for his relative who is planning to work abroad in Russia. He does not have enough funds, which is why Oybek really relies on a positive outcome. He thanks Arvand in advance for their financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy an airline ticket to Russia for his relative.

loans.name: Tuoi's Group

texts.en:
Mrs Tuoi was born in 1977, is a new member just joined the program in late 2013. She is of the Thai people, living with her husband and her child in Mai Son district, Son La province, and she is also the leader of the group with 3 members.
Despite being a new member, Tuoi and her husband also have salary with a stable income, repaying small loans on regular basis will not too be difficult for her family. Currently, her family is in the need of repairing their house and sub works (toilet, cistern, kitchen) so it requires much money. Her family has also set aside a portion, but still not enough so they need to borrow more. She is looking forward to the help.
If she can borrow loan, she will deduct a portion of their family income monthly to pay for the loan. She hopes this loan will help her family to have a spacious house, and sub works will be improved to be more convenient and clean.

loans.use: to repair their house and sub works (toilet, cistern, kitchen)

loans.name: Bich's Group

texts.en:
Mrs Bich was born in 1977, is Thai ethnicity. She and her family are living in one of the poorest areas in Mai Son district. Due to her family’s difficulties, her oldest children had to leave school at17 years old to support his parent in tilling the fields. Her little child is at the school age.
After years of tilling fields and forest plantation, she also accumulates amount of  money to fix the toilet and renew her low- roofed house. However, the accumulation is not enough so she need to borrow more money.
Bich has been participating since January 2013. Other members in her group are members of M7-MFI before her. All members are well complied with M7-MFI’s policies effectively. 
With this loan, Bich and her family wish to have better living conditions and contribute to making the village grow and be more civilized.

loans.use: to fix the toilet and renew her low-roofed horse

loans.name: Kho's Group

texts.en:
Kho’s group includes 3 members, of wich Mrs Kho is the group leader.
Mrs Kho, 47 years old, is a client member of M7-MFI since January 1st 1994. Her family includes 3 members: Mrs Kho, her 56 year old husband and her son, born in 1990. Her family has income primarily from vegetables, industrial crops and livestock and poultry breeding. Due to growing vegetables and raising livestock and poultry, her family needed to build stables to look after, care for livestock, poultry, preserved fruits and vegetables as well as hygienic surroundings. So, she needs to borrow some money to serve this purpose.
Without high income but stables, she ensures to repay the loan in full and on time. In addition to the construction of this barn, she hopes to expand the range of breeding and cultivation to get more income to make saving when she is at the old age.

loans.use: to build stables to look after, care for livestock, poultry, preserved fruits and vegetables as well as hygienic surroundings

loans.name: Santrinah

texts.en:
Santrinah is a new client, age 28, married to Obed, and they are blessed with four children. She hails from Bunyinya village, Rukungiri district. She is an agriculturalist on a very small scale because of limited resources.
She is applying for a loan of UGX 2,000,000, which she wants to use for buying more goats for trading. Her main challenge has been limited capital for buying more goats, which she thinks would improve her finances, catering for her kids and dependents, and paying their tuition.

Santrinah is honest and hard working, and her dream is to expand her business and earn more profits.
With this loan from UGAFODE, she is hopeful that her business is going to expand and eventually get sustainable. In the photo is Santrinah in her garden.

loans.use: to buy more goats for trading.

loans.name: Mien's Group

texts.en:
Mrs Mien, 32 years old, is living with her husband and 2 children of school age. The couple till the fields and cultivate industrial crop that brings them income as well. However, their lives are still difficult because their children are still at school age. Her family is building toilet and repairing their house so she needs to borrow some money. With an income from cultivation, though it is not large, ensures her family can gradually repay monthly.
Mien is the group leader of Mien’s Group, which includes 3 members. For group members, the latest member has been participating in M7-MFI for at least 5 years.
	With this loan, Mien and her family desire better living conditions and to have a toilet to avoid environmental pollution. The house will be repaired to be more solid to facilitate her children in learning as well as make her and her husband feel secure to earn a living and pay for the loan.

loans.use: to build toilet and repair her house

loans.name: Hanh's Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hanh is 49 years old. Her family has 3 people, including her husband and her child. Her family is one of the high- income families and most stable at her living area. She was the member of Mai Son Fund for Assistant to Ethnic minority women (the forerunner of M7 Microfinance Institution Limited – Mai Son Branch) over 10 years.
Last year, she expanded cultivation area that requires more large costs, so her family has a shortage of money to buy organic fertilizer for crops. Mrs Hanh is the group leader of Hanh’s Group with 4 members. In addition to Mrs Hanh, the remaining members of the Group mainly borrow money to buy seedlings and vegetable trade.
With this loan, Hanh desires to have good conditions to take good care for her crop, to get high profit, paying debt and saving money in order to have a stable income for when she gets old and her health is not as good as before.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for crops

loans.name: Gulnoz

texts.ru: Гулноз опытная портниха и шьёт красивые национальные платья. Ей 22 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 3 года назад она начала свой бизнес предоставлением услуги швеи. Благодаря  хорошему сервису, она обладает широким кругом клиентов. Она планирует открыть свой швейной цех, но для этого она должна купить новые швейные машинки, но ее доход не позволяет ей купить это. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для покупки 2 новые швейные машинки. Она надеется на вас и вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulnoz is an experienced seamstress and sews beautiful ethnic Tajik-style dresses. She is 22 years old. She is married and is raising one child. In order to provide her family with all of the necessities, she began her own business three years ago offering sewing services. Thanks to her excellent services, she has a wide circle of clients. She plans to open her own sewing workshop, but in order to do that, she needs to buy new sewing machines. However, her incomes does not allow her to buy them. She is requesting a loan for 1000 USD to buy two new sewing machines. She relies on you and your kindness.

loans.use: to buy two new sewing machines to increase working capital.

loans.name: Erkinjon

texts.ru:
Эркинчон жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 33 лет. Он женат и имеет 3-их детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку.  Сам Эркинчон живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Эркинчона также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Эркинчон занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Также Эркинчон подрабатывает мастером. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Эркинчону в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота.  Сейчас Эркинчон хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Эркинчон очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Erkinjon is a cheerful and hardworking 33-year-old man. He is married and has three children. He turned to Arvand for the first time when he realized that there was the opportunity to receive financial support. Erkinjon lives with his family in the countryside. He does not have a higher education, as he did not have the opportunity to study at university due to financial difficulties in his family. Erkinjon's wife also does not have an education. She is a homemaker who does the household chores and raises their children.

In order to have an income to live on, Erkinjon has his own business. He fattens up and sells cattle. Erkinjon also earns extra money as a foreman. He receives a good income from this business. His wife also helps Erkinjon with this business. She sells the milk which she gets from the cows. Now Erkinjon wants to increase the size of his herd to expand his business. This is why is requesting a loan from Arvand to buy cattle. Erkinjon really relies on a positive outcome and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan works hard to support her family. She is married and has a dried fish making business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to make dried fish.

In the future, Joan would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to make dried fish.

loans.name: Soi's Group

texts.en:
Mrs Soi, born in 1971, is Thai people. She lives with her husband and 3 children at Mai Son district, Son La province. Her family mainly engaged in breeding and cultivation. Her family life is still difficult because two children are at school age. She has been participating in the credit program for many years, accumulating money for a long time but still not enough money to repair toilet and sub works of her house. She hopes to receive the help to accomplish this long desire.
With her industrious family, saving and accumulating from breeding and crops, she will gradually repay for M7-MFI. This loan is an opportunity for her and other members of the Group to do trading, breeding, cultivation, repairing houses and farms to improve economy and living conditions which have been very difficult in this poor rural area.
Her group has 4 total members and they are all members participating in the program for over 5 years. Due to their difficult lives, they often borrow loans from M7-MFI and strictly comply with the regulations of loan use as well as repayment schedule.

loans.use: to repair toilet and sub works of her house

loans.name: Chung's Group

texts.en:
Mrs Chung, from Thai ethnic community, is one of the first members of M7-MFI who joined in the organization in January 1st 1994. Her family consists of 3 members. In addition to her are her husband and her son. Her son is an apprentice.
Her family lives mainly on cultivation and breeding so the annual income is just sufficient for a normal life. Currently, there is an increased cost when her son is at apprenticeship; it causes more difficulties for her family. Therefore, she is looking to borrow amount of money to pay for his education fees. She will try to do breeding and cultivation to have money to pay for loan on time.
Chung is the group leader of Chung’s Group. This group consists of 5 members with different purposes in borrowing loans such as buying fertilizer, breeding in farm. But members are all loyal, working with the organization for many years so M7-MFI is fully confident on their on-time payment as well as trust they will have better lives after each efficient loan use.

loans.use: to pay for her child's education fees

loans.name: Dominga Antonia

texts.es: Dominga es habitante de la comunidad de punta ñata con el apoyo de sus padres logro estudiar  toda la escuela primaria. Además aprendió los quehaceres del hogar, cuando ya era una adolescente  se enamoró y  se casó con el que hoy su esposo y padre de sus  4 hijos. Su esposo se dedica  a la agricultura siembra de maíz, frijoles y ella se dedica a la crianza y engorde de cerdos  para venderlos  además de  trabajar en el campo en las temporadas de corte de café   como ambos trabajan y aportan a los gastos del hogar la responsabilidad de mantener a sus  hijos no es tan pesada ademas que sus  hijos mayores  trabajan y aportan también  para gastos de la casa En la comunidad no hay luz  eléctrica,  aunque ellos ya saben del beneficio de usar paneles solares porque hace un tiempo atrás compraron uno y les funciona muy bien ahora harán este préstamo para comprar algunos de los componentes del sistema solar ya que tienen que renovarlos para que este les siga  funcionando  en un 100 por ciento.
texts.en:
Dominga lives in the community of Punta Ñata.  She managed to finish elementary school with the support of her parents.  She also learned how to do the household chores.  She fell in love when she was a teenager and married the man who is now her husband and the father of her four children.

Her husband makes a living in agriculture growing corn and beans, and Dominga raises and fattens pigs to sell.  She also works in the fields during the coffee harvest.  As both of them work and contribute to the household expenses, the responsibility of supporting their two children is not so difficult.  Also, the older ones work and help with the food expenses because they still live at home.

There's no electricity in the community.  Dominga already knows the benefits of using solar panels because a while ago they bought one and it's working very well for them.  With this current loan she's going to buy some components for the solar energy system that need to be fixed so the system will function at a hundred percent.

loans.use: to buy a battery and an inverter

loans.name: Mach's Group

texts.en: Residing in Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Mach is 21 years old and blessed with one school-age child. To deal with her family’s financial burden in her household, she grows cassava and rice as her main business. She has done this for three years and earns about 31,000 KHR per day. She is not a new borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). This is her third cycle loan, and she leads a group of three. She has completely repaid her past loans with success, and they have improved her lifestyle so that it is better than before. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pesticide and to pay for plowing fees. She hopes to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticide and to pay for plowing fees

loans.name: Lo Tuoi's Group

texts.en:
Mai Son district has many families that plant industrial crops such as coffee and sugar cane. Mrs Tuoi was born in 1975, living with her husband and 3 children. The main income of her family is from tilling the field. Now is the time of developing crops in this area so people in here are at the high demand of borrowing money to buy organic fertilizer for crop. Tuoi and 3 other members in this Group are mostly in need of capital for this purpose. The members are involved in credit and saving programs of M7-MFI from the year 2000 and have a very good repayment history.
	With this loan, Tuoi look forward to having a favorable crop. Coffee tree, sugar cane, and corn of her family will yield high profit so her family can cover the living and well care for 2 children at the school age.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for crops

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Emprendedoras es un numeroso grupo integrado por 25 señoras, quienes están en su ciclo número 11 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Hacen la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde casi todas las integrantes ya lograron superar la línea de pobreza; a través de las Capacitaciones del Plan de Negocios y Técnica en Ventas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Luisa quien ha logrado mejorar su situación de pobreza, estando hoy en un nivel tres, pero igualmente se debe seguir esforzando para mantenerse donde está. Ella tiene una despensa más sólida luego de contar con la ayuda y las capacitaciones que le da la Fundación Paraguaya, también se debe destacar el trabajo de las asesoras, quienes hacen un seguimiento permanente de capacitaciones y verificaciones que de alguna manera exigen y al mismo tiempo incentivan a las mujeres a luchar para poder superar la pobreza.
La Sra. Solicita este préstamo para la compra de harina, azúcar, fideo, aceite, leche, bebidas en general; entre otros; lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Mujeres Emprendedoras is a large group made of 25 women, who are in their 11th cycle of the women's committee program, where all of them work and help each other to succeed. 

They did an elimination of poverty survey, where all the members have already risen above the poverty line through the Business Plan and Technical Sales Training.

One of the members is Luisa, who has succeeded in improving her situation of poverty. She is now on level three, but also must continue striving to stay where she is. She has a pantry which is stronger after the help of Fundación Paraguaya training. 

We should also highlight the work of the consultants, who do continuous monitoring and training which at the same time help encourage women to fight to overcome poverty.

Luisa is asking for this loan to buy flour, sugar, noodles, oil, milk and general drinks to sell, among others, which will help her solidify her business plan, allowing her to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, noodles, oil, milk and general drinks to sell.

loans.name: Emprendedoras De Cabañas Group

texts.es:
“Emprendedoras de Cabañas” es de la ciudad de Caacupé, donde las integrantes de este grupo son mujeres jefas de familia que están luchando por sus familias para poder ayudarlos a salir adelante.
La señora Ana es integrante de este grupo, es comerciante, y comenta que se dedica a la venta de flores y plantas, por medio del cual  ayuda a su familia para poder darles todo lo que ella no pudo tener. Es una persona muy trabajadora que con mucho sacrificio esta saliendo adelante.
El préstamo que pide lo quiere invertir en la compra de las plantas y flores para su posterior reventa. Actualmente también vende frente a un cementerio la venta de flores los fines de semana.
texts.en:
“Emprendedoras de Cabañas” is from the city of Caacupé where the members of this group are heads of the households and who are striving for their families to come out ahead.

Ana is a member of this group. She is a merchant and says she sells flowers and plants which help her family to be able to give them everything she couldn’t have growing up. She is a very hard worker who, with much sacrifice, is coming out ahead.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of plants and flowers for subsequent resale. Now she also sells flowers on the weekend in front of a cemetery.

loans.use: to purchase plants and flowers to sell.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel es comerciante; dueño de un Camión Tumba, se dedica al servicio de flete de carga de arena lavada y otros, vive en la ciudad de Pilar,  él es muy conocido en la zona, presta servicio hace más de 5 años.
Es una persona  muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que con mucho sacrificio está saliendo, y dice que todo lo que tiene lo obtuvo trabajando y esforzándose bastante.
Pide este préstamo para la reparación de su camión, ya que ese es su único medio de ingresos para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Miguel is a merchant, owner of Camión Tumba (Tumba Truck). He makes a living freighting loads of washed sand and other things. He lives in the city of Pilar. He is very well-known in the area, having provided his services for more than five years.

He is a very hard-working and entrepreneurial person, and with much sacrifice he is getting ahead. He says that everything he has was obtained by working hard and putting forth a lot of effort. He is requesting this loan for the repair of his truck, since this is his only income source, so that he can help his family.

loans.use: to repair his truck to do freighting

loans.name: San Cayetano 2 Group

texts.es:
El comité “San Cayetano II” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní, una zona bastante rural que aún se encuentra en crecimiento, y carente de muchas cuestiones, como seguridad y acceso a medios de comunicación.
Maria es una de las integrantes de este grupo, quien se dedica a la cría, venta o faena de animales de corral que ella misma cría. Comenta que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas ya que siempre está pendiente de sus animales para que estén bien y de esa forma tener carne de calidad.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus animales, y de esa forma seguir con la venta de sus animales como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The “San Cayetano II” committee was formed with the union of several female neighbors from the city of Santaní, a quite rural area that is still growing, and lacks many things, such as security and access to means of communicating.

Maria is one of the members of this group, who makes a living raising, selling and slaughtering farm animals that she raises herself. She states that she works every day beginning in the early hours, since she is always has to be attentive to her animals so that they are well, and that way they have quality meat. She is requesting this loan in order to be able to invest it in the purchase of animal feed, so she can continue selling her animals like she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy animal feed

loans.name: San Jose Group

texts.es:
El comité San José se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la comunidad Santaní, todas las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
Sofia es parte de este grupo, ella tiene un pequeño copetín donde vende todo tipo de productos, como ser comestibles, bebidas, golosinas y demás. En su pequeño negocio trabaja todos los días para poder tener un ingreso con el cual poder ayudar a sus seres queridos. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora, que con sacrificio esta saliendo adelante.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de golosinas, jugos, galletitas y demás productos, que le permitirá poder seguir con sus ventas, y dando a sus clientes lo que piden. Agradece por esta ayuda que está recibiendo de ir mejorando.
texts.en:
The San José group was formed by the gathering of several neighbors in the Santaní community.  All of the members form a very close group that is capable of together carrying out the work that strengthens their friendship.

Sofia is part of this group; she has a small stand where she sells all types of products like food, drinks, candy, and more.  She works every day in her small business in order to get an income with which she can help her loved ones.  She is a very hard-working person who, with sacrifice, is getting ahead in life.

She asks for this loan so that she can invest in the purchase of candy, juices, cookies, and other products that will allow her to continue with her sales and to give her clients what they ask for.  She is grateful for the help that she is receiving to improve.

loans.use: to buy candy, juices, cookies, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Stella

texts.en:
Stella is a farmer and a mother of three children, all of school-going age. She has been doing farming for 15 years with her income source being milk, tea, crops, transportation services, and she also has a retail business.

She enjoys the general farm work, but her biggest challenges are poor market conditions and insufficient skills in farm activities.

She chose Juhudi Kilimo because of its quality financial assistance in terms of processing loans with speed, and also because they charge lower interest rates on their loans. During the training, she learnt that through microfinance institutions, shareholder farmers can benefit a lot. This loan will help her to expand her farming activities and thus get more income, which will help her to pay for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs.

loans.name: Asford

texts.en:
Asford lives and does farming in the Kisii area of Nyanza, Kenya - an area known for sugarcane and banana farming. He has been doing farming for four years. He loves dairy farming the most, while his major challenge is climatic change.

Asford chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because they offer their loans at a low interest rate and this favours small scale farmers the most.During the training, he learnt how to better his products and farming activities. This dairy cow project will give him more milk for selling and thus increase his income. The income will improve his living standards.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chicks and poultry feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more vegetables and cooking oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Meet Alfred.  He is a farmer living in the rich highlands of Litein in the South Rift area. He is married and has four children who are each of school-going age.  He has been farming for the past 14 years and his primary income is earned from milk, tea and a retail business. He states that what he loves about farming is drenching (providing a large oral dose of liquid medicine to an animal) and his biggest challenge is pests (ticks) that affect his livestock.

Alfred chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because of the favorable interest rates available on their loans. He learned that microfinance institutions do offer financial assistance to small income earners for the betterment of their lives. This loan will enable him to construct a dairy unit that will provide his dairy cows with a good environment for better production, which will increase his income.

loans.use: for construction of a dairy building.

loans.name: Haide

texts.en:
Haide is 36 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to resell, such as shampoo, groceries, etc.

Haide has borrowed and paid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years, and earns an income from a coffee shop.

Haide aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to resell, such as shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan.

She has restarted her 2012 business and is now requesting a PHP 9,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor so she can build a house for her family.

With your help, Merlinda will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Merlinda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Suhandi

texts.en:
Suhandi runs a small stall selling mobile accessories and mobile phone airtime credits. He lives north of Bogor, a semi-urban area about two hours from Jakarta.  Suhandi is married and living with three people in the family home. 

Suhandi began working with Ruma one month ago because he wanted to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business runs, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more airtime and bill payments transactions in a weekly basis.

loans.name: Uguloy

texts.ru:
Угулой позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 40 лет. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Имеет среднее образование. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Угулой мечтала стать учительницей, но так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Затем Угулой вышла замуж и стала домохозяйкой. Но, даже находясь постоянно  дома,  она никогда не сидит без дела. Она вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым.

Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Угулой вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. От этого бизнеса они получают хороший доход. Муж Угулой ещё подрабатывает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Угулой с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Угулой заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Uguloy is a positive and hardworking 40-year-old woman. She is married and has two children. She has a secondary education. She lives in a small country village. From childhood, Uguloy dreamed of becoming a teacher but circumstances happened such that she was unable to receive a higher education due to financial difficulties in her family. Then Uguloy got married and became a homemaker. But even though she is always at home, she never sits idly. She and her husband try to do all that they can to provide their children with all of the necessities.

In order to have a steady income to live on, Uguloy and her husband started their own business. They practice livestock breeding. They receive a good income from this business. Uguloy's husband also earns extra money as a local foreman. His work brings in additional income to the family. Their joint income is enough for an average standard of living. Now they do not have enough money to cover all of their current needs. Currently, Uguloy and her husband want to buy several more heads of cattle to fatten up. This is why she requested a loan from Arvand to buy cattle. Uguloy thanks Arvand in advance for the support, which will help improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Hassana

texts.en:
Meet 28-year-old Hassan from Jui Eastern  area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. He is married with 2 children between the ages of 1 and 12. One of his children is currently attending school. 

Some years ago, Hassan established a phone accessories business. He began his business because he wants to create a permanent source of income to support the home. He works at the business from 7:00am until 7pm, 6 days per week. He says that the main challenges to his business are the high cost of transportation and price inflation.

Hassan requires a loan in order to buy more phone sockets, DVDs and phone charges for resale. He hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow him to repay his loan and increase his business. In the future, Hassan wants to expand his business even more. 

He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more phone sockets, DVDs and phone charges for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more medical drugs for resale.

loans.name: Maulana

texts.en:
Maulana runs a small stall selling mobile accessories and mobile phone airtime credits. Maulana lives north of Bogor, a semi-urban area about two hours from Jakarta. Maulana is single and living with three people in the family home. 

Maulana began working with Ruma two months ago because he wanted to increase his income. He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more airtime and bill payments transactions in a weekly basis.

loans.name: Tri

texts.en:
Tri runs a small stall which sells snacks and mobile phone airtime credits. Tri lives North of Bogor, a semi-urban area about two hours from Jakarta.  Tri is married and living with four people in the family home. As seen in the picture: Tri with her son.

Tri began working with Ruma one and a half months ago because of the good services.  She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business runs, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more airtime and bill payments transactions in a weekly basis.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more jeans, shirts and clothing material for resale.

loans.name: Lia

texts.en:
Lia runs a small stall selling drinks, groceries and mobile phone airtime credits. She lives north of Bogor, a semi-urban area about two hours from Jakarta.  Lia is married and living with three people in the family home. 

Lia began working with Ruma one and a half months ago because of the good services.  She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. As the business continues to run, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more airtime transactions in a weekly basis.

loans.name: Lilik

texts.en:
Lilik runs a small stall selling snacks and mobile phone airtime credits. She has been running this stall for two years. Lilik lives in Yogyakarta, a semi-urban area about 10 hours from Jakarta.  Lilik is married and living with four people in the family home.  

To increase the family income, Lilik also works as a dealer.  She joined Ruma two months ago to increase her income and she feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments for customers.

Lilik is starting to process electricity bill payments for her customers, which is a much-needed service in the area and will increase her income.  To provide this new service, Lilik is required to print out receipts for customers.  A Kiva loan will be able to help her purchase this printer and be able to offer the new service.

loans.use: To purchase a printer to provide receipts for customers

loans.name: Letwin

texts.en:
Letwin is 23 years old and married with one child. She lives in the Mbire District of Zimbabwe. Letwin is passionate about helping empower young women in her community. In the past, she worked as an early child development teacher for a year. 

Currently, Letwin rents a shop at a local flea market where she sells jeans, shirts, dresses, shoes and jackets for a living. She started the business to help improve her living standard. She really loves her business and would like to increase her sales volume in order to expand the business. 

Letwin will use the Kiva loan to purchase a large bale of clothes and shoes to increase her stock. Her proceeds will be used to improve her living standard and create employment in her community. She hopes to own her own boutique one day.

loans.use: to purchase a large bale of clothes and shoes to increase her stock.

loans.name: Siti

texts.en:
Siti runs a small stall selling snacks and mobile phone airtime credits. She has been running this stall for two years.  Siti lives in Yogyakarta, a semi-urban area about 10 hours from Jakarta.  She is married and living with three people in the family home.  

To increase the family income, Siti also works as a dealer. She joined Ruma four months ago to increase her income and feels really excited to expand her business by selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments for customers.

Siti is starting to process electricity bill payments for her customers, which is a much-needed service in the area and will increase her income.  To provide this new service, Siti is required to print out receipts for customers.  A Kiva loan will be able to help her purchase this printer and offer the new service.

loans.use: To purchase a printer to provide receipts for bill payments

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es: El señor Domingo, es un humilde productor agropecuario, tiene una pequeña finca ubicada  en el municipio de Nueva Guinea, la cual trabaja en conjunto con sus 6 hijos y esposa, todos  comprometidos en obtener mayores niveles de producción que mejore su economía familiar. Domingo tiene mucha experiencia  en el manejo del cultivo de cacao, para lo cual solicita este crédito con el objetivo de invertir en materiales, herramientas, insumos, mano de obra, que ayuden a efectuar buenas prácticas agrícolas con el propósito de incrementar la productividad de cacao, convirtiéndola en una producción sostenible.
texts.en: Domingo is a humble farmer who has a small farm in the town of New Guinea, where we works with his 6 children and his wife. They are all committed to achieving higher production levels that would improve household finances. Domingo has a lot of experience in cultivating cocoa plants, for which he is requesting this loan. He intends to invest in materials, tools, supplies, and manual labor. This will improve his agricultural practice, which will increase his cocoa productivity, thus making it a sustainable production.

loans.use: purchase tools, fertilizers, fungicides, and pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es: Efraín es un campesino de familia trabajadora que junto a su esposa procrearon 4 hijos, de los cuales 2 ya son independientes, los demás están en edad escolar y le apoyan en  algunos trabajos en el campo. Él siempre se ha dedicado a las actividades agrícolas y ganaderas, en la actualidad tiene una pequeña parcela de cacao de 2 mz que ha trabajado con mucho esmero, el cual tiene el objetivo de ampliar y mejorar, implementando buenas prácticas agrícolas amigables con el ambiente y no perjudiquen los recursos naturales, por lo cual solicita el crédito para el establecimiento de un vivero, compra de herramientas e insumos, pago de mano de obra, que le permitan desarrollar las actividades agrícolas de siembra, poda, control de maleza, fertilización entre otras, logrando de esta manera un rendimiento satisfactorio y poder comercializarlo a un precio justo en el mercado que en la actualidad tiene una buena demanda.
texts.en:
Efraín is a farmer from a hardworking family.  With his wife, he has four children, two of whom are independent, and the rest are school-age and help him with some of the farm work.  He has always dedicated himself to agricultural work and livestock.  Currently, he has a small, 14,000 square foot parcel of cacao that he has worked on with great care.  His goal is to expand and improve it by implementing good agriculture practices with the environment that do not harm natural resources.

For this reason, he is seeking a loan to establish a nursery, purchase tools and supplies, and pay for labor, which will allow him to perform agricultural activities such as planting, pruning, weed control and fertilizing, among others.  Through this, he will have a satisfactory yield and be able to sell it at a fair price in the market as the demand is high.

loans.use: purchase supplies such as fertilizers, fungicides, herbicides, bags for his nursery, tools and pay for labor.

loans.name: Mao

texts.en:
Mao is 41 years old, lives in a village about 30 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. He has four children-two sons and two daughters.  

Mao is a wooden house constructor, while his wife stays at home and does housework. Nowadays, he has an old motorbike for his family transportation. But, the motorbike is breaking down and does not work well, he wants to sell it! Hence he decided to ask for a loan to add to his own money to purchase new motorbike.

Photo: Mao and his wife are under their wooden house.

loans.use: To add to his own money to purchase a new motorbike.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to raise chickens and pigs

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is married with eight children, who work hard to support her family.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell of recycled materials business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of recycled materials to sell.

Marcelina has borrowed and paid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell of recycled materials for 10 years and earns an income from farming rice and raising pigs.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of recycled materials to sell

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn works hard to support her family. Marilyn is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net.

Marilyn has been in this business for two years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net

loans.name: María Angelica

texts.es:
María de  19 años de edad, solo estudio hasta 3º año de bachillerato y no esta acompañada solo  la mama le ayuda económicamente a veces.


María posee negocio de pupusas y de comida rápida como: hamburguesas, papitas, hot dog etc. y se dedica al negocio hace tres años y lo aprendió con la mamá y el negocio lo tiene en su casa de habitación vende todos los días por la tarde.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar pan, salchicha, verduras, bebidas, carne, etc y para reparar su dormitorio. De esta manera incrementara la materia prima para elaborra la comida que vende y satisfacer a sus clientes.

Su deseo es tener un buen negocio, bien surtido y con mas personal para darles buena atención a los clientes, las ganancias las utilizara para comprar lo necesario del negocio.
texts.en:
María is 19 years old and only studied through the third year of high school. She is not married and her mother helps her out financially on occasion.

María has a business in which she sells “pupusas” (stuffed tortillas) and other types of fast food such as hamburgers, French fries, hot dogs, and other items. She has been in this business for three years, having learned the trade from her mother. Her business is located at her house, where she sells every day in the afternoons.

The loan she is requesting from CrediCampo will be used to buy bread, sausages, vegetables, beverages, meat, and other supplies. She will also repair her bedroom. This loan will help to increase her supplies for preparing the food that she sells so that she can satisfy her customers. Her wish is to have a successful business that is well stocked so that she can provide good service and personal attention to her customers. Her earnings will be used to buy whatever she needs for her business.

loans.use: to buy bread, sausages, vegetables, beverages, meat, and other supplies, as well as pay for repairs to a bedroom in her house.

loans.name: Mahlio

texts.ru:
Махлиё мать двои прекрасных детей. Живет на селе далеко от города. Она замужем. Муж для поддержания семьи  уехал на заработки в Россию. Махлиё не сидит ожидая того, что муж будет посылать на жизнь деньги и сама  активно стремиться улучшить жизнь своих детей и повысить средний заработок своей семьи.    Она работает не покладая рук для того чтобы дети росли в достатке и получили образование. Конечно у нее как и многих матерей есть мечта , чтобы ее дети выросли образованными. Ведь у нее только среднее образование.
 Махлиё выращивает скот. Она изготавливает в домашних условиях молочные продукты. После долгой холодной зимы запасы кормов , которые она делала на зиму закончились и теперь до того как прорастут новые корма ей нужно купить корма для скота, но средств вырученных от продажи молочных изделий хватает только на  расходы семьи и поэтому Махлиё хочет взять заем для приобретения кормов. Махлие очень надеется на поддержку от Кива.
texts.en:
Mahlio is a mother of two wonderful children. She lives in a village very from the city. She is married. In order to support their family, her husband left to work abroad in Russia. Mahlio does not sit waiting around for her husband to send home money to live on, but actively strives to improve her children's lives and raise the average earnings of her family. She works diligently so that her children can grow up comfortably and receive an education. Of course, she, like many mothers, has the dream that her children will grow up educated. After all, she only has a secondary education.

Mahlio raises cattle. She makes dairy products at home. After the long, cold winter, her store of feed which she gathered for the winter was all used up. Now, in order to germinate new feed, she needs to buy cattle feed. However, the money gained from her dairy product sales is only enough for her family's expenses. This is why Mahlio wants to take out a loan to buy feed. Mahlio really relies on the support from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy cattle feed.

loans.name: Bernadeth

texts.en:
Bernadeth works hard to support her family. Bernadeth is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to purchase stocks to sell like can goods, egg, milk, soap, etc.

Bernadeth has been in this business for 3 years now.

In the future, Bernadeth would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase stocks to sell like can goods, egg, milk, soap, etc

loans.name: Prudencio

texts.es:
Prudencio es un hombre soltero de 35 años de edad, actualmente tiene una relación de unión de hecho con su pareja, ellos tienen dos hijos  ambos menores de edad, quienes viven en el Departamento de Sololá.
Don Prudencio es un hombre trabajador que busca la manera de sacar adelante a su familia. El comenta que se dedica a manejar un vehículo en donde transporta mercadería como agua y refrescos a diferentes tiendas, esto lo realiza con el propósito de mejorar la economía de su familia. También comenta que su pareja lo ayuda aportar a la economía de su familia, a través de la venta de verduras y lo realiza en el mercado local de su comunidad. 
El ahora se ha dado cuenta que cada vez hay más demanda en este tipo de trabajo, de manera que ha decidido solicitar un préstamo de Q 6,000.00 para la compra de llantas y aceites que servirán para el vehículo, esto lo pretende hacer, para mejorar el servicio que le presta a sus clientes. 
Uno de los sueños de Don Prudencio, es comprar otro vehículo para poder ampliar su servicio a otros lugares y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Prudencio is a single 35-year-old man who lives with his two children who are both minors. They live in the department of Sololá.

Don Prudencio is a hardworking man who wants to get his family ahead. He mentions that he makes his living driving a vehicle in which he transports merchandise such as water and sodas to different stores. He does this in order to improve his family's finances. He also says that his partner helps to support the family financially by selling vegetables. She does this in community's local market.

Now he has realized that there has been more and more demand for his kind of work. As a result he has decided to request a loan of Q6,000.00 to buy tires and oils that will service his vehicle. He wants to do this to improve the service he provides to his customers.

One of Don Prudencio's dreams is to buy another vehicle so that he can expand his service to other areas and in that way improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tires and oils for his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizer to grow coffee.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es: Manuela es una persona de 52 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Nahualá, departamento de Sololá, tiene dos hijos, la primera tiene 30 años de edad ya está casada y el segundo tiene 21 años de edad, trabaja como jornalero y la ayuda con los gastos de la familia, Manuela se dedica a vender ropa típica que viste las persona de la comunidad por eso siempre tiene posibilidad vender, ella ha pasado toda su vida vendiendo, Manuela necesita un crédito por un monto de Q. 10,500.00 para invertir en la compra  de  más ropa típica y para tener más variedad y más productos, el sueño de ella es tener más grande el negocio.
texts.en:
Manuela is a 52-year-old woman, who lives in the town of Nahualá, in the department of Sololá. She has one daughter of 30 years old, already married; and a son of 21 years old who works as a laborer and helps her with the household expenses. 

Manuela sells traditional clothing that people from her community wear, and that is the reason why she always has a sales opportunity. She has been in the sales business her whole life, and now is asking for a loan of Q. 10,500.00 to but more clothes for her clothing business. With this she’ll be able to have more variety in her products. Her dream is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing for her clothing business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Carmen

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo, su hija de 13 años y su hijo de 17 años de edad. Mercedes se dedica a la comercialización de pollos. El negocio lo tiene desde hace 4 años y la venta la realiza en las principales zonas de su localidad.
