Mercedes desea invertir en su negocio dado que desea mejorar sus ingresos y al mismo tiempo sus condiciones de vida. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de 50 pollos y vitaminas para criarlos y luego ponerlos a la venta. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder mejoras sus ventas con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Mercedes is 35 years old. She lives in her own house along with her husband, her daughter, age 13, and her son, age 17. Mercedes sells chickens. She has had this business for 4 years, and she makes her sales in the principal areas of her district. Mercedes wants to invest in her business, given that she wants to improve her income and at the same time her living conditions. For this, she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of 50 chickens and vitamins to raise them and later offer them for sale. She hopes to be able to have this financing and thus be able to improve her sales with the goal of improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy 50 chickens and vitamins for her business

loans.name: Edwina

texts.en:
Edwina, a 58-year-old mother of four, helps operate their own cafeteria. For many years of serving food, she has been able to provide for the family.  She had to be determined in her work to provide a better living  for her family. 

In order to increase sales, she borrows a loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase raw ingredients to prepare food to sell. She hopes that someday, her children will be successful in their career and she will sustain her business with an improved income.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients to prepare food to sell

loans.name: Muslihi

texts.en:
Muslihi is a 58 years old, retired, and is married to Hadawiyah, a 55 year old woman.  They have 5 children from their marriage, Muhammad, a 34-year-old entrepreneur; Ramli a 33-year-old employee; Abdul is a 31-year-old private employee; Tety, who is 23 years old, and Hasanudin, who is 21 years old - both are university students. 

Muslihi is building a new house.  He has already finished with the foundation of the house, the walls, the window-frames and the door-frame.  At the moment he needs more money to put up the roof, and therefore has requested an individual loan of 5,000,000 IDR to purchase housing materials such as wood and a zinc roof.

loans.use: to purchase housing materials such as wood and a zinc roof.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn works hard to support her family. She is a widow and has a general store business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now is requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Liezl

texts.en:
Liezl works hard to support her family. She is a married parent of two children.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

Liezl is borrowing 10,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Junhna

texts.en:
Junhna works hard to support her family. Junhna is married and has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines.

Junhna is borrowing PHP 1800 through NWTF in order to buy a solar lamp.

She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to have backup light in case of emergency.

Junhna is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is saving money, she is helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is a 40-year-old married woman with three children, two of which are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Margie has a digital studio business in the Philippines. She requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional materials and equipment like photo paper, additional camera, etc. for her business.

Margie has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Margie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and equipment like photo paper, additional camera, etc. for her business

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen is 28 years old and married with two children. All of the children are in school. Karen works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has been in this business for three years.

Karen requested an 18,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, and cream.

In the future, Karen would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, and cream.

loans.name: Isrrael Benjamin

texts.es:
Isrrael de 52 años de edad,  solo estudio primer grado de nivel académico,  está casado,  la esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar. Sus le ayudan a trabajar en la agricultura, aunque solo 4 hijos viven con él y su esposa. 

Isrrael se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años de edad este trabajo se lo enseño el papá, ya que él quería que aprendiera el oficio para que en un futuro le sirviera y siempre le inculco en   el buen camino. Este trabajo le queda a una distancia de 10 minutos  y él viaja a pie, su horario de trabajo es de las 6 de la mañana hasta las doce del mediodía.

Con el préstamo solicitado lo necesitara, para pagar el alquiler de la tierra donde cultiva el maíz, ya que ha decidido preparar con tiempo porque ahorita están alquilando en la zona que es muy bueno para el cultivo y quiere aprovechar esa oportunidad esto le ayudara mucho porque si él invierno es bueno sacara muy buena cosecha.
texts.en:
Israel is 52 years old. He only studied first grade education. He is married and his wife looks after the household chores. His children help him working in farming, although only four of his children live with him and his wife.

Israel has made a living in farming since he was 15 years old. His father taught him this job as he wanted him to learn the trade so that it would benefit him in the future and he took care to raise him well. This job is about 10 minutes away and he walks there. His work timetable is from 6 in the morning until 12 midday.

With this loan he will pay the rent on the land where he produces corn. He has decided to prepare the terrain in plenty of time as this area which is being rented out is currently giving very good crops and he wants to make the most of this opportunity. This will help him because if the winter is good he will obtain a very good harvest.

loans.use: to par the rent on the land where he produces corn

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 57 años de edad, no estudio ya que en aquel tiempo sus recursos  eran muy ajustados para la familia, él está casado y tiene seis hijos de los cuales solamente dos viven con el los demás ya tiene sus propias familias, su esposa se dedica a cuidar de su familia y sus hijos.

 Juan se dedica a la agricultura, lo hace desde hace más de treinta años y fue su padre quien le enseñó  esta actividad, además de eso se dedica a la crianza de animales como lo son los cerdos y aves, él trabaja toda la semana y tiene que caminar cuatro kilómetros para poder llegar al lugar de sus trabajo. 

El crédito que él está solicitando lo necesita para invertir en la siembra de granos básicos.

Con respecto a sus sueños quiere que sus hijos sigan estudiando para que sean profesionales en el futuro, también mejorar su estado de vida.
texts.en:
Juan is 57 years old. He did not get an education because at that time, resources were very tight for his family. He is married and has six children, of whom only two live with him; the rest already have their own families. His wife is a housewife, taking care of the family and their children.

Juan works in farming. He has done that for more than thirty years, and it was his father who taught him the trade. In addition to that, he raises livestock like pigs and poultry. He works all week and he has to walk four kilometers to get to the place where he does his work.

He needs the loan that he is requesting to invest in planting staple grains.

With respect to his dreams, he wants his children to stay in school so that they can become professionals in the future. He would also like to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in planting staple grains.

loans.name: Wamin

texts.en:
Wamin runs a small stall where he sells mobile phone airtime credits and mobile accessories. He has been running this stall for one year. Wamin lives in Indramayu, a semi-urban area about six hours from Jakarta. Wamin is married.

To increase the family income, Wamin also works as a dealer. He joined Ruma one month ago because he wanted to increase his income. He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments for customers.

Wamin is starting to process electricity bill payments for his customers. This is a much-needed service in the area and will increase his income. To provide this new service, Wamin is required to print out receipts for customers. A Kiva loan will help him purchase this printer and be able to offer the new service.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions.

loans.name: Yoern Moern's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Dam is a 46-year-old mother of seven children. She is a rice farmer who has been growing rice for 12 years. The current business earns her about 40,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Dam has been with VisionFund for six cycles and successfully paid back the past loans. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to grow more crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland.

loans.name: Maria Itzel Rocio

texts.es:
Maria Itzel es una clienta de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.

Maria Itzel esta casada y tiene dos hijos pequeños que van a la escuela. Maria Itzel se dedica desde hace más de 20 años a vender ropa de niña en un  tianguis. Hace unos meses ella pidió un préstamo para comprar mercancía y lo pago puntualmente. Ella dice que su negocio va muy bien y que quiere seguir creciendo, por eso esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo para comprar ropa de temporada. Una de sus mayores satisfacciones es haber empezado un negocio y lograrlo mantener por más de 20 años, también esta contenta de poder mandar a sus hijas a la escuela ya que ella solo estudio hasta la secundaria. Maria Itzel se describe así: "soy una persona independiente, comprometida que con esfuerzo y dedicación, tengo mi propio negocio y una meta para mi es comprar una casa".
texts.en:
Maria Itzel is a client of Kubo Financiero and this is her story:

Maria Itzel is married and has two small children that go to school.  For more than 20 years she has been selling children's clothing in a bazaar.  A few months ago, she asked for a loan to purchase merchandise and she paid it back punctually.  She says that her business is doing very well and that she wants to continue growing.  For this reason, she is requesting a new loan to buy new seasonal inventory. One of her biggest satisfactions is having started a business and being able to maintain it for more than 20 years.  She is also happy for having been able to send her daughters to school, given that she could only study up through secondary school.  Maria Itzel describers herself as such: "I am an independent person, committed to effort and dedication, I have my own business and a goal for me is to buy a house."

loans.use: to purchase different samples of girls' clothing in order to sell seasonal merchandise.

loans.name: Srey's Group

texts.en:
Srey is 37 years old and married. She is a villager from the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district. She has five children, two of whom are dependent on her and still in school. 

The main source of her family’s income is from farming rice. Having been in this business for 15 years, she is able to earn a daily income of 40,000 KHR to support her family. She can save about 28,000 KHR per day for future needs. 

This is the second loan for Srey with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She is now leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farmland. 

Srey hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: La Confianza En Dios Group

texts.es: Es un grupo de tres socios trabajadores, coordinado por el señor Leonardo de 54 años de edad, casado y padre de tres hijos que no dependen de él, se dedica a la venta de repuestos de vehículos, tiene aproximadamente ocho años de dedicase a este negocio y cuenta con la ayuda de su esposa, el crédito lo invertirá en repuestos de vehículos como es la compra de baterías, mangueras, llantas, neumático y otros tipos de accesorios para vehículos, estos artículos lo compra en el mercado capitalino. Los otros socios son la señora Guillermina de 47 años, vende tortilla en su domicilio a la población cercana a su comunidad, y la señora Margarita de 32 años, propietaria de una pulpería en su domicilio, brindando el servicio en su comunidad.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three members coordinated by Leonardo. He is 54 years old, married and the father of 3 children who are not dependent on him. He has been selling spare parts for vehicles for approximately 8 years and has the help of his wife to run the business.

Leonardo will invest in replacement parts for vehicles like batteries, hoses, tires, tubes and other accessories for vehicles. He will buy them in the market in the capital city.

The other members are Guillermina who is 47 years old and sells tortillas from her home to the surrounding population and Margarita, 32, who is the owner of a small store located in her home which services the local community.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle parts like batteries, lights, tires and other motorcycle and vehicle accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a quintal of corn, sugar, banana leaves, and perishable goods such as onion, “chiltoma” [red pepper], garlic, oil, etc.

loans.name: Juana Lucia

texts.es: La señora Juana es una mujer exitosa que ha sabido invertir los préstamos para mejorar su calidad de vida, tiene 34 años, casada y madre de dos hijos que dependen de ella economicamente, es profesora de primaria en su comunidad y tiene su negocio de venta de cosméticos AVON, ARABELA, y cosméticos de marca inferior, además que vende ropa nueva como ropa de niños, camisas de mujer, camisetas para caballeros, jean de mujer, jean de varón, bóxer para caballeros, bóxer para damas, y más
texts.en: Señora Juana is a successful woman who has learned how to invest the loans to improve her quality of life. She is 34 years old, married, and the mother of two children who depend on her economically. She is a primary school teacher in her community, and she has a business of selling Avon and Arabela cosmetics as well as cosmetics of less expensive brands. In addition, she sells new clothing such as children's clothing, women's shirts, men's t-shirts, women's and men's jeans, men's and women's boxers, and more.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics such as lipstick, nail polish, compacts, blush, perfumes, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Estrella

texts.es:
En San Jacinto  del cantón Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros,  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 55 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos mayores de edad e independientes, con ellos viven dos nietos de 14 y 5 años que son como sus hijos y estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.
Doña Rosa tiene un  negocio en su casa en el cual vende todo tipo de materiales de pesca, allí sus clientes encuentran  piolas, hilos, redes y otros materiales necesarios para estas actividades, ella también con una parte del crédito le da para combustible ya que su esposo tiene una lancha en la cual todos los días se dedican a las faenas del mar, ella lleva más de 17 años con este negocio con el cual se ayuda para sacar adelante a su familia.
Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar piolas, redes, combustible y varios materiales de pesca. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda y beneficios que recibe del banco. Sus sueños son que sus nietos tengan una buena educación.
texts.en:
In San Jacinto in Tosagua canton, the "Bankito La Y" communal bank meets every two weeks. This place is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited by many domestic and foreign tourists. It offers a variety of beautiful places and a rich variety of typical regional dishes. 

This is where Rosa lives. She is 55, married and has four adult children who are independent. Two grandchildren, 14 and 5, live with them and are like her children. They go to high school and primary school respectively. 

Her husband is fisherman. Rosa has a business in her home where she sells all kinds of fishing supplies. There her customers find rope, fishing line, nets and other materials necessary for these activities. With a part of the loan she will also buy fuel, as her husband has a small boat which he uses to go fishing every day. She has had this business for more than 17 years and it is helping her to support her family. 

She is going to use this loan to buy rope, nets, fuel and various fishing supplies. She has been with the communal bank group since the beginning, and likes it because of the help and benefits that she receives. Her dream is for her grandchildren to have a good education.

loans.use: Buy ropes, nets, fuel and fishing supplies.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She was able to buy more products for her tailoring business. Her loan also helped her with sending her children to school while her income is assisting their everyday household expenditures. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs. 
 
She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan for her to buy cloth, thread, and the other materials she needs for her rug-making business. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her family's daily needs and children’s education. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Marites hopes to be more successful in her business and dreams that her family is always in good condition. She meets with her co-fellowship members every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, to build social capital, and to pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for cloth, thread, and other materials for her rug-making business.

loans.name: Julio Fautino

texts.es: La sueva brisa proveniente del lago Cocibolca y un rico olor a Vigoron nos abre las puertas a la majestuosa Ciudad de Granada  lugar de residencia de  Don Julio un señor de 60 años de edad, originario de los frescos Pueblos Blancos de Diriomo, de excelente valores éticos y morales, sus inicios los obtuvo deleitando a las personas con su artesanía manual, actualmente hace 7 años y 6 meses se dedica a la pesca, casado y padre de 3 hijos ya independiente de él, obteniendo un gran éxito en el negocio de la pesca usando un canal de distribución muy factible, su meta próxima es la adquisición de un motor nuevo para trabajar más eficiente y obtener más producto para satisfacer las necesidades de más clientes potenciales. Solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar nuevas redes, embarcaciones y motores para lograr ser una gran cadena de comercialización de mariscos a nivel nacional, estimando que el crédito a solicitud le será de gran ayuda para lograr ser esa cadena de suministros de mariscos, su planes a futuros es extraer más producto del lago de excelente calidad para expórtalos a otros países de Centroamérica.
texts.en:
The gentle breeze coming from Lake Cocibolca and the rich smell of Vigoron (a traditional dish made of cabbage) are the gateway to the majestic city of Granada, where Julio lives.  He is 60 years old, and is a native of Diriomo, one of the "white towns" around Granada (known for the traditional whitewash used on their buildings).  He has excellent moral values and ethics.  

Julio started out delighting people with his handicrafts.  Now, for 7 and half years, he has been working as a fisherman.  He is married and is the father of 3 children who are already grown and independent.  He has been having great success with his fishing business, using a very practical distribution channel.  His next goal is to acquire a new motor so that he can work more efficiently and obtain more products to satisfy the needs of more potential customers.  

Julio is requesting a new loan to buy new nets, boats and motors so that he can build his business into a chain of seafood production at the national level.  He expects that this loan will be a great help in building this fishing supply chain.  For the future, he plans to take out more excellent quality products from the lake to export to other countries in Central America.

loans.use: to buy nets, boats, and motors

loans.name: Luisa Emilia

texts.es:
Con un delicioso aroma a carne asada, así recibe Doña María Luisa a todos sus clientes en su comedor el día de hoy en la ciudad de Granada.  Su sonrisa, amabilidad y su deliciosa sazón, son cualidades que se ven y se saborean diariamente en su local.  Su negocio ha crecido y ha logrado variar el  menú con la ayuda de su nieta y gracias a un préstamo de apoyo integral que solicitó para la compra de nuevos productos alimenticios. 
Los sueños de María Luisa no terminan aquí.  Desea seguir invirtiendo en  su  negocio  de ropa y cosméticos  que inició  con las ganancias de su comedor. Solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar Ropa, Cosméticos, e insumos para la elaboración de comida. Su objetivo es conseguir nuevos clientes, en ambas áreas,  y por supuesto, continuar trabajando para crecer económicamente y  brindar  un mejor servicio que haga felices a sus consumidores.
texts.en:
With a delicious aroma of grilled meat is how Doña María Luisa receives all of her customers in her eatery today in the city of Granada. Her smile, friendliness and her delicious seasoning are qualities that are seen and enjoyed daily in her establishment. Her business has grown and she has succeeded in varying the menu with the help of her granddaughter and thanks to a loan of comprehensive support that she requested for the purchase of new food products. 

María Luisa's dreams do not end here. She wishes to continue investing in her clothing and cosmetics business that she started with the profits from her eatery. She is requesting a new loan in order to buy clothing, cosmetics and supplies for making food. Her goal is to get new customers in both areas, and  of course continue working to grow economically and provide a better service that would make her consumers happy.

loans.use: to buy clothing, cosmetics and supplies for making food.

loans.name: Marta Del Rosario

texts.es:
En esta historia, la perseverancia y determinación tiene nombre: Martha del Rosario. Ella es un ejemplo de mujer emprendedora, sus primeros pasos al comercio los dio con una pequeña pulpería, luego vendiendo prendas de segunda mano, sin embargo, existía mucha competencia por lo que decidió  dedicarse al negocio de ropa interior con la ayuda de su esposo, que labora para una compañía de seguridad.
Martha ha logrado establecer un sencillo  local en la ciudad de Granada desde hace un año.  Pero lo mejor está aún por venir, ya que las metas  de esta risueña mujer no finalizan aquí, desea ampliar su negocio  para ofertar a sus clientes otra variedad de productos. Solicita el credito para comprar: Ropa interior, Camisolines y Camisetas. De esta forma las  condiciones económicas  de su familia mejoraran  día a día.
texts.en:
In this story, perseverance and determination have a name: Martha.  She is a great example of an enterprising woman.  She took her first steps in commerce in a small grocery store.  Then she sold second-hand clothes.  After learning how the competition worked, she thought it would be better to dedicate herself to selling underwear.  She does this with the help of her husband, who also works in a security company.

Matha was able to set up a small shop in Granada a year ago.  However, the best is yet to come because this cheerful woman’s ambitions do not stop here.  She wants to expand her business now and offer a wider selection of products to her customers.  She is asking for a loan to buy underwear, blouses and shirts.  This will help her to improve her family’s financial situation day by day.

loans.use: Comprar: Ropa interior, Camisolines y Camisetas.

loans.name: Candelaria Nohemi

texts.es:
En una de las esquinas del barrio San Pedro, en Boaco, se encuentra la pulpería de Candelaria, una joven de 28 años, alta, morena y con una mirada amistosa que hace de sus 13 años de trabajo como comerciante, todo un éxito. 
Candelaria, a pesar de no haber concluido su secundaria, decidió emprender y manejar su propio negocio, de la mano con MiCredito y Kiva, para salir adelante junto a su pequeña familia. Agradecida con el préstamo que le otorgaran sabe que podrá comprar arroz, aceite, azúcar, frijoles, entre otras cosas de mayor demanda en su venta, y así seguir creciendo y mejorando su calidad de vida como lo ha hecho durante su valerosa jornada.
texts.en: Located on one of the street corners of the San Pedro neighbourhood, in Boaco, is the grocery store owned by Candelaria, a young 28 year old woman, tall, dark and friendly looking, whose 13 years working as a trader have been a great success. Candelaria, in spite of not having completed her secondary education, decided to start up and run her own business, together with MiCredito and Kiva, so that her and her small family could make progress. She is grateful for the loan they granted her and knows she can purchase rice, oil, sugar and beans, amongst other goods that are most in demand in her store, and thereby continue to grow and improve her quality of life as she has done courageously throughout her life.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, sugar and beans, as well amongst other things

loans.name: Krouch's Group

texts.en:
Krouch is a resident from the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province. She is 35 years old and is a mother of five kids, two of whom are in school. 

Her entire family solely counts on cassava farming as the main source of income. This business has earned her about 23,600 KHR per day. 

She is in a second cycle loan with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. Her joint-borrower is in a seventh cycle loan.  

Krouch has positively used the past loan which she has fully repaid back. The loan helped to support her business and earn a decent income which helped her to provide daily decent meals for her kids. 

Now, she is seeking loan of 1,000,000 KHR, and her co-borrower is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 KHR. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy pesticides and fertilizer and to pay for plowing and labor fees. 

Krouch hopes to expand her farmland and business to a larger scale.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and fertilizer and to pay for plowing and labor fees.

loans.name: Erick Jose

texts.es:
Al entrar al taller de soldadura de Erick José, nunca se le ve cansado, siempre está realizando alguna tarea, moviéndose de un lugar a otro. Es originario del departamento de Estelí, está casado y tiene dos hijos. Su mayor temor es que en su taller no haya trabajo. Comenzó en el negocio hace tres años. Su preocupación principal es brindarle estabilidad económica a su familia y que sus hijos tengan la oportunidad de ir al colegio para lograr un futuro próspero.
Él solicita un préstamo para lograr uno de sus objetivos, la compra de un compresor de aire 110 y de esta manera aumentar la clientela. Su plan futuro es acondicionar mejor su casa para que su taller crezca.
texts.en:
When entering Erick José's welding working, one never sees him tired. He is always carrying out some task, moving around from one place to another. He is from the area of Estelí, is married and has two children. His biggest fear is that there is no work in his workshop. He started in the business three years ago. His main concern is providing economic stability to his family and that his children have the opportunity to go to school in order to achieve a prosperous future.

He is asking for a loan to achieve one of his objectives: the purchase of a 110 air pump, which will increase his clientele. His future plan is to set up his home better so that his workshop can grow.

loans.use: to buy a 110 air pump

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru: Дилшоду 35 лет.  Он положительный молодой мужчина , который любит свою семью и детей. У него пожилые родители, которые не остаются без его внимания.  Вместе с женой  Дилшод воспитывает  троих детей. Дети учатся в школе. У самого Дилшода  образование  среднее.  Дилшод занимается животноводством. Это занятие ему досталось от отца.   Он выращивает на убой скот.  Жена помогает ему  но большее время она проводит дома на   воспитанием детей.   Для того чтобы обеспечить свою большую семью он трудится не покладая рук,  а доход от животноводства хватает только на питание и мелкие  хозяйственные расходы.  Дети растут  и на их обучение  тратится  большая сумма. Основное время Дилшод  проводит за своим делом .  Для развития своего бизнеса он хочет приобрести еще одного теленка. Но сейчас он не располагает достаточной суммой, поэтому решил воспользоваться кредитом. Очень надеется, что «Кива» поможет ему в реализации его планов. Заранее благодарен за поддержку.
texts.en: Dilshod is 35 years old. He is a positive young man who loves his family and children. He has elderly parents who he is very attentive to. Dilshod and his wife are raising three children. His children attend school. Dilshod himself has a secondary education. Dilshod practices livestock breeding. He inherited this business from his father. He raises cattle for slaughter. His wife helps him, but she spends the majority of her time at home raising their children.  In order to provide for his large family, he works diligently, but the income from livestock breeding is only enough for food and small household expenses. His children are growing up and a lot of money goes toward their education. The majority of Dilshod's time is spent running his business. He wants to buy another calf to develop his business. But he currently does not have enough money, which is why he decided to take out a loan.  He really hopes that Kiva will help him accomplish his plans. He thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy a calf.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to assist her coffee crops

loans.name: Teresa Del Carmen

texts.es: Teresa de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella  posee una tienda desde hace varios años ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante en los gastos del hogar, Teresa esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería como: granos básicos, leche, azúcar, sopas, jabon, detergentes, etc. para surtir con mas productos su tienda y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener con su esposo una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Teresa is 37 years old and lives in her own huse with her husband. She has had a store for various years, located in her residence. Teresa has a lot of clientele due to the quality of her products and her good prices. With what she earns on sales and with the help of her husband, she manages to cover their household expenses.

Teresa is requesting a loan to be able to purchase more merchandise, including basic grains, milk, sugar, soups, soap, detergents, etc., to restock her store with more products and obtain better earnings so that she and her husband can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy basic grains, milk, sugar, soups, soap, detergents, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Audelia

texts.es: Rosa de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija y su yerno, ella se dedica a la venta y elaboración de tamales y pupusas su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su hija logra salir adelante en los gastos del hogar, Rosa esta solicitando un crédito para la compra todo lo necesario para elaborar sus alimentos como: de hojas de huerta para envolver los tamales, maíz, chicharron, quesillo, frijoles, pollo, verduras, etc. y asi continuar con sus ventas y tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Rosa is 57 years old and lives in her own house with her daughter and son-in-law. She makes and sells tamales and pupusas out of her home. She has a lot of customers because she offers good prices and friendly service. With her earnings from her business and her daughter's help, she is able to cover household expenses. Rosa is requesting a loan to buy everything she needs to make her foods, including leaves to wrap her tamales in, corn, pork rinds, fresh cheese, beans, chicken, vegetables, and so on. That way, she can keep selling food and have a better quality of life along with her family.

loans.use: to buy everything she needs to make her foods

loans.name: Zoila Argentina

texts.es:
Para Zoila, la costura es su pasión. En su sala se encuentran desde trajes para niños hasta grandes juegos de sábanas. Ella es originaria de la ciudad de Granada. Tiene 58 años, está soltera y tiene dos hijos. Sólo realizó los estudios de la primaria, pero la difícil situación económica la llevo a buscar la costura como un medio factible para salir adelante.
Ella está muy agradecida por haber obtenido el primer préstamo, ya que fue capaz de comprar telas, hilos y una nueva máquina de coser. Asegura que su clientela aumento, lo que la llevo a generar más ganancias. Zoila solicita un segundo préstamo para la compra de más materiales tales como: Telas e hilos y así  lograr  uno de sus sueños, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, de manera que la producción no pare sino que siga ascendiendo.
texts.en:
For Zoila Argentina, sewing is her passion. In her living room you can find everything from suits for children and adults to sheet sets. she is from the city of Granada. She is 58 years old, single, and has two children. She only went to primary school but the difficult financial situation led to her finding sewing as a feasible way to get ahead.

She is very grateful for the first loan, because she was able to buy fabric, thread, and a new sewing machine. She says that her clientele grew, and this led to generating more income. Zoila is asking for a second loan to buy more materials such as fabric and thread. This way she can attain one of her dreams, which is to improve her living conditions in a way that the production doesn't stop but keeps growing.

loans.use: to buy more materials, such as fabric, and thread.

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Paula de 59 años de edad,  nunca tubo la oportunidad de estudiar, debido a la pobreza de sus padres, ya que para ellos no tenia importancia estudiar. Paula es madre soltera, su compañero de vida murió hace 20 años, tiene 4 hijos todos están acompañados y ella solo vive con una nieta

Paula siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura trabajo que aprendió con su papá, esta muy  agradecida con sus padres, ya que al morir su pareja, le toco sola trabajar para sacar a sus hijos adelante, ninguno de sus hijos tomo mal camino, todos son trabajadores, ahora ya no trabaja pero supervisa el trabajo de sus hijos cuando les lleva comida.


El préstamo sera invertido para sembrar plantas de platano en 7,000 metros cuadrados de terreno y fertilizantes.

Sueña con mejorar su casa, la que tiene es de adobe, comprar un terreno para dejarles a sus hijos, comprar una vaca que de leche y pagar el crédito para y tener acceso a futuros.
texts.en:
Paula, 59, never had the opportunity to study due to her parents' poverty. For them, studying was not important. Paula is a single mother. Her life partner died twenty years ago. She has four children, all of whom are in relationships. She lives with one of her granddaughters.

Paula has always worked in agriculture, having learned about this from her father. She is very grateful to her parents, because when her partner died, she had to work alone to provide for her children. None of her children went down a bad path. All of them are hardworking. Now she does not work, but she supervises the work of her children when she brings them food. 

She will invest this loan in planting banana plants in 7,000 square meters of terrain and for fertilizer.

She dreams of making improvements to her house, which is made of adobe, and buying a plot of land to leave to her children, as well as buying a dairy cow and paying off this loan in order to have access to future loans.

loans.use: to plant banana plants in 7,000 square meters of terrain and for fertilizer

loans.name: Flora Maria

texts.es: Con amabilidad, cortesía y carisma,  atiende a sus clientes Flora María en su tienda diariamente. Luce un semblante serio, sin embargo posee el don de la simpatía, que es nato en ella desde pequeña. Sus inicios al comercio los dio vendiendo ropa y calzado  por encargo, con esfuerzo y sacrificio consiguió ahorrar hasta abrir su propio negocio en su hogar. Solicita el préstamo para comprar: Ropa, Calzado, Cosméticos y Perfumes.  Su propósito es  seguir trabajando para mejorar su estilo de vida ya que ha demostrado ser una mujer emprendedora, honrada y  responsable.
texts.en:
Flora María attends to the customers who come to her store each day with friendliness, courtesy, and charisma. Despite the serious look on her face, Flora has the gift of expressing sympathy, which is something that she possessed at an early age.

She started in this line of work by accepting orders for clothing and shoes. Through effort and sacrifice, she was able to continue saving until she was able to open a business in her home. Flora is requesting a loan in order to buy clothing, shoes, cosmetics, and perfumes. Her goal is to continue working so that she can improve her lifestyle. She has already demonstrated that she is an enterprising, honest, and responsible woman.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, cosmetics, and perfumes to sell.

loans.name: Cruz María

texts.es:
En San Jacinto  del cantón Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros,  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.
En este lugar vive la señora Cruz, tiene 40 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos de 22, 19, 17 y 8 años, los tres menores estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca. 
Doña Cruz es una muy buena esposa la cual utiliza una parte del crédito para ayudarle a su esposo que requiere de materiales para realizar una buena pesca y la otra parte para su negocio, ella tiene un restaurante cerca de la playa en un lugar que le dicen la boca y que es muy concurrido sobre todo los fines de semana, allí ella con la ayuda de sus hijos atienden a sus clientes ofreciéndoles los mejores platos típicos del lugar, la especialidad son los mariscos ya que es lo que más piden sus clientes,  ella lleva ya más de 10 años en este negocio el cual les ha ayudado a salir adelante. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar materiales de pesca, alimentos y otros víveres para preparar los paltos que ella vende. Lleva 4 años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda. Sus sueños son tener un local propio ya que arrienda.
texts.en:
n San Jacinto in Tosagua canton, the "Bankito La Y" communal bank meets every two weeks. This place is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited by many domestic and foreign tourists. It offers a variety of beautiful places and a rich variety of typical regional dishes.
This is where Cruz lives. She is 40 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has four children, ages 22, 19, 17 and 8. The three youngest go to high school and primary school. Her husband is a fisherman.


Cruz is a very good wife who is using part of the loan to help her husband, who needs supplies to do well in his fishing, and another part for her business. She has a restaurant near the beach in a place they call La Boca, which is very busy, especially on weekends. There, with the help of her children, she serves her customers, offering them the best typical local dishes. The specialty is seafood, as this is what her customers ask for most. She has already been in this business for more than 10 years, and it has helped them to move forward in life. 

She is going to use this loan to buy fishing supplies, food and other groceries for preparing the dishes she sells. She has been in the communal bank for four years and likes it because of the help she receives. Her dream is to have her own place, as she is renting.

loans.use: To buy fishing supplies, food and groceries.

loans.name: Jennelyn

texts.en:
Jennelyn previously accessed a 15,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education, as well as for the family's personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan in order to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in a better profit. The profits from her business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and the children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Jennelyn dreams of expanding more and hopes to give her children a good life and education. She meets up every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business, and also to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 2 years now.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. In the future, Marilou would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is 52 years old and married with six children, one of whom is in school. Adelaida works very hard to provide for them. Adelaida runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, noodles and other groceries. In the future Adelaida would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 56 years old, single, and works hard to help her nephews. She has a buy-and-sell rice grains business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 7 years.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional rice grains to sell. In the future, Marilou would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en: Marivic is 54 years old and married with five children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of household goods to sell. Marivic has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of household goods to sell.

loans.name: José Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro de 41 años de edad, esta acompañado solamente tiene una hija quien estudia, él solamente estudio tercer grado, ya que padres no tenían los suficientes recursos para costearle los estudios, su esposa y su hija dependen de él, se dedica a la carpintería, desde más de diez años , el oficio lo aprendió porque un vecino le enseño cuando estaba más joven  y es lo que le ha ayudado a él y a su familia a salir adelante, él solamente se dedica a la carpintería y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, su carpintería la tiene cerca de sus casa a unos metros de distancia.

 El crédito lo necesita para reforzar su carpintería y para comprar algunos materiales que le hacen falta como lo son madera y alguna herramienta que le hace falta para trabajar más para que genere más ganancias y mejore los ingresos y así con eso mejorara la estabilidad de su familia. Con lo que respecta sus sueños, él quiere construir su casa ya que en las condiciones que vive  no son muy adecuadas , él quiere que su hija sea una profesional que trabaje y que pueda mantenerse por sí sola.
texts.en:
Pedro is 41 years old and has a partner and one daughter, who is in school. Pedro only completed up to third grade at school as his parents did not have enough money to pay for his education. Pedro's wife and daughter depend on him. Pedro has been a carpenter for over ten years, having learned the trade from a neighbour when he was younger. This work has helped Pedro and his family to get ahead. This is Pedro's only job, while his wife is a housewife. Pedro's workshop is just a few metres from his house.

Pedro needs this loan to strengthen his carpentry workshop and buying materials - such as wood - and tools that he needs. With these items he can work more, increase his profits and income, and improve his family's financial stability. Pedro's dream is to build his own house as he does not live in very good conditions. Pedro also wants his daughter to become a working professional who is able to support herself.

loans.use: to strengthen his carpentry workshop and buying materials - such as wood - and tools that he needs.

loans.name: Salomat

texts.ru:
Саломат очень ответственная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она пенсионерка и имеет на ижденвении детей. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. Жизнь Саломат сложилась не благополучно, ей приходится много работать, чтобы иметь доход на пропитание. Сразу после окончания средней школы Саломат выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Она вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым.

Сама Саломат сотрудничает с Арванд вот уже более 3-х лет. Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Саломат вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Саломат выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса она получает хороший доход. Получаемого от этого бизнеса дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Саломат с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Саломат заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Salomat is a very responsible and hardworking woman. She is retired and has dependent children. She lives in a small rural village. Salomat's life turned out unfortunately, as she had to work a lot in order to have an income to live on. Right after she graduated from secondary school, Salomat got married and became a homemaker. She and her husband try to do all that they can to provide their children with all of the necessities.

Salomat has partnered with Arvand for more than three years. In order to have a steady income to live on, Salomat and her husband started their own business. They practice livestock breeding. Salomat raises the cattle and then sells the meat and milk that she gets from them. She receives a good income from this business. The earnings are enough for an average standard of living. Now they do not have enough money to cover all of their current needs. Currently, Salomat and her husband want to buy several more heads of cattle to fatten up. This is why she requested a loan from Arvand to buy cattle. Salomat thanks Arvand in advance for the support, which will help improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Harold

texts.es:
El joven Harold habita en el municipio de santa Rosa del peñón departamento de león, una ciudad donde los habitantes se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio y brindan su servicio a la población para sobre vivir.   

Harold es una joven de 34 años de edad con un hijito bajo su cargo, con lo poco que el gana a duras penas ayuda a mantener el sustento diario a su hijo y le brinda una buena educación, pero es de su gran necesidad construir un pequeño dormitorio en su vivienda, esto es porque su familia va creciendo cada día mas.  

Desde hace catorce años ejerce el trabajo como maestro, pero son de sus sueños vivir en mejores condiciones con su familia. 

Es de su gran necesidad que Ceprodel y Kiva le brinde un crédito, para la compra de: zin, cemento y arena esto lo ve de gran importancia, para lograr a obtener los sueños de su vida. 

Se siente a gusto con este tipo de empleo porque le ha ayudado mucho con su familia. 

Agradece con el apoyo que Ceprodel y Kiva le ha brindado y espera en Dios seguir recibiendo este privilegio, de estos pequeños créditos.
texts.en:
Harold lives in the town of Santa Rosa del Peñon, in the department of León, a city where all the inhabitants work in different business activities and give their services to the population in order to survive. 

He is a 34-year-old man with a small son under his care. With the little money that he earns, he barely gets to support his son’s needs, including a good education. However, one of his great needs is to build a small bedroom in his house because his family is still growing.

He has been working as a teacher for the past 14 years, but his dream is to give his family better living conditions. He likes this kind of job because it has helped him a lot with his own family.

Right now he is in need of a loan from Ceprodel and Kiva to buy: zinc, cement and sand. This will help him to achieve his life dreams. 

He is thankful for the all the support that Ceprodel and Kiva have given him, and with God’s help, he hopes to keep receiving the privilege of these loans.

loans.use: to buy: zinc, cement and sand.

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.en:
Leonarda is 64 years old and married with six children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has borrowed and repaid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for twenty years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane. Leonarda aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Ulugjon

texts.ru:
Улугчон  замужем  имеет двоих детей.Также ее семья помогает пожилым родителям.  Ей  42 года. Эта энергичная 
женщина очень оптимистично настроена к жизни. Несмотря на трудности , которые ей приходится преодолевать в жизни  она не теряет оптимизм.  Подросшие дети помогают ей  обрабатывать землю, выращивать урожай, растить сады. Земля тоже отвечает такому человеку взаимностью и предоставляет хороший урожай. Каждую весну  Улугчон  засеивает поле и после упорного труда получает осенью долгожданный урожай. Для того, чтобы заработать сын и муж Улугчон поехали на заработки  в Россию. 
В Этом году она хочет приобрести саженцы и посадить сад. Но для этого ей потребовались дополнительные средства за , которыми она и обратилась в "Арванд". Улугчон надеется что ее сад будет радовать не одно поколение ее семьи.
texts.en:
Ulugjon is married and has two children. Her family also helped her elderly parents. She is 42 years old. This energetic woman has a very optimistic outlook towards life. Despite the difficulties which have burdened her life, she has not lost her optimism. Her teenage children help her till the land and grow crops and gardens. The land also responds to her reciprocally and offers her a good harvest. Every spring, Ulugjon sows the fields and after a lot of hard work, receives a long-awaited harvest in the fall. In order to earn money, Ulugjon's husband and son work abroad in Russia.

This year, she wants to buy seedlings and plant an orchard. She needs additional funds for this, which is why she turned to Arvand. Ulugjon hopes that her orchard will bring joy to many generations of her family.

loans.use: to buy seedlings.

loans.name: Neoun's Group

texts.en:
Neoun, a mother of four kids, is a resident from Kampong Cham province and she is 39 years old. All four of her children still count on her. Three of them are in school and the remaining one is too young for schooling. To struggle for a living, Neoun does rice farming and cassava planting as the main sources of income. The business that she has been involved in for three years earns her almost 39,000 KHR. 

Neoun is not a new borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is in her fourth-cycled loan with successful repayment, which has enabled her to provide sufficient food for her family. Now, she is looking for a new loan, and she is a group leader of five members. The total amount of her entire group requesting loan amount is 8,200,000 KHR, of which 2,000,000 KHR is her loan portion. As a leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pesticide and to pay plowing and harvesting fees for her cassava field. She hopes her cassava will produce a better yield than before and will enable her to upgrade her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, pesticide and to pay for plowing and harvesting fees

loans.name: Thean's Group

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house with her family members in a rural village of the Moung Russey district, Thean is 53 years old and married with six children. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice, and sometimes her husband works for others for a fee. Having been in this business for 32 years, she manages to earn about 32,000KHR per day and can save about 10,000KHR each day for future needs. 

Thean is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a  loan. As the leader, Thean is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to increase her crop yields and earn more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 26 years old and married with one child who is in school. Mary Grace works very hard to provide for the family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like soap, shampoo, eggs, noodles, etc.

She has been in this business for 2 years. In the future Mary Grace would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like soap, shampoo, eggs, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Thea's Group

texts.en: A young mother of two daughters and a resident from Kampong Cham province, Thea is one of the breadwinners in the family. She struggles for a living via cassava planting as the main source of income. She has been involved in the current business for four years and it has returned her around 26,400 KHR per day. Now, she is looking for a loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she is a leader. This is the second loan for her and the first loan for her fellow group member. She’s requesting a loan of 1,600,000 KHR and her member is requesting a loan of 400,000 KHR. As a leader, she will use her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pesticide and to pay the plowing fee. She hopes that this business will improve and enable her to send her kids to school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticide and to pay the plowing fee.

loans.name: Ma. Nieva

texts.en:
As a married mother of ten children, Ma. Nieva works hard to support her family.

She has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice. Ma. Nieva is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF in order to buy spare parts for her tricycle transportation business.

Ma. Nieva has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her tricycle transportation business.

loans.name: Farangis

texts.ru:
Фарангис молодая незамужняя женщина. Ей 26 лет. Она живет со своими родителями. Занимается тем, что помогает родителям выращивать скот, доит корову, и перерабатывает молоко. Образование у нее среднее. Но Фарангис хочет стать самостоятельной и поэтому она хочет приобрести мелкий рогатый скот, чтобы  в дальнейшем накопить на открытие самостоятельного бизнеса. Конечно у нее есть мечта получить образование. Она стремится накопить средства и получить заочное образование и в дальнейшем стать успешной финансово независимой женщиной, способной самостоятельно решать проблемы и помогать тем кто нуждается в помощи. Конечно же это её мечты но они достойны того ,чтобы поддержать её в начинаниях.
Для воплощения мечты Фарангис не хватает средств. Знакомые Фарангис посоветовали обратиться в "Арванд". Запрашиваемая сумма хватит ей  чтобы купить скот и начать  дело и тем самым открыть новую страницу в своей  жизни. Фарангис рада , что для поддержки начинающих предпринимателей есть такие организации как Кива. Она заранее благодарна в помощи.
texts.en:
Farangis is a young, 26-year-old, unmarried woman. She lives with her parents. She helps her parents raise cattle, milk the cows and process the milk. She has a secondary education. However, Farangis wants to become independent which is why she wants to buy small livestock so that in the future, she can save money to open her own independent business. Of course, she dreams of getting an education. She strives to save money to take correspondence courses and become a financially successful independent woman in the future; a woman who is able to self-sufficiently solve her own problems and help those that need assistance. Of course, these are just her dreams but they are enough to carry her through the beginnings of her business.

Farangis does not have enough money to implement her goals. Farangis's acquaintances advised her to turn to Arvand. The requested amount is enough for her to buy cattle and start her own business, thus turning over a new page in her life. Farangis is glad that there are such organizations like Kiva that support first-time entrepreneurs. She thanks you in advance for your help.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca works hard to support her family. Rebecca is a widow and has a buy and sell of frozen foods business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of frozen foods to sell.

Rebecca has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Rebecca would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of frozen foods to sell

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita works hard to support her family. Teresita is married and has a business operating a rice mill  in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her rice mill.

Teresita has been in this business for five years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her rice mill

loans.name: Adela

texts.en:
Adela works hard to support her family.  She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell.

Adela has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Adela  would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell

loans.name: Almeda

texts.en:
Almeda works hard to support her family.  She is married and has a business buying and selling root crops in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional root crops to sell.

Almeda has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Almeda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional root crops to sell

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase stocks to sell like soft drinks, canned goods, chips, etc.

Mercedita has been in this business for 12 years now.

In the future, Mercedita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase stock to sell like soft drinks, canned goods and chips

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza works hard to support her family. Riza is single and has a buy and sell of feed and other veterinary products business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell.

Riza has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell

loans.name: Clarissa

texts.en:
Clarissa is married with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Clarissa is 31-years-old and has two children who are in school.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Clarissa requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Clarissa has been in this business for four years. In the future, Clarissa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Susamie

texts.en:
Susamie is 56 years old and married with five children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. 

Susamie has been in this business for three years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Zukhrakhon

texts.ru: Зухрахон молодая приветливая женщина в возрасте 24 лет. Она замужем и уже имеет маленьких детей. Зухрахон живет в сельской местности, в районе Кубадиён. Она как и все жители занимается сельской деятельностью и разводит скот у себя во дворе. Зухрахон начала выращивать бычков для продажи год назад. Ей эта деятельность нравится, так как приносит доход ее семье. Сейчас она хочет увеличить поголовье скота и с такой целью обратилась за кредитом. Она надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Zukhrakhon is a young and friendly woman of 24. She is married and already has two young children. Zukhrakhon lives in a rural area in the Qubadiyon region. Like all residents, she works in agriculture and keeps cattle in her yard. Zukhrakhon started raising steers for sale a year ago. She likes this occupation as it brings her family income. Now she wants to increase the number of cattle she has and with this goal she is requesting a loan. She hopes for support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Erwin

texts.en:
This is Erwin, 42, resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. He is married to Rosaly, a marketing manager and they have children. He, together with his wife, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.
  
Erwin operates a junk shop. Trash is not actively segregated in the Philippines, and while waiting for their local dump trucks, people scavenge garbage dumps and trash bags for recyclable materials like metal, copper, plastic, paper and other materials. They sell these to junk shops for a little profit. Junk shops then stack, clean, and gather huge quantities of these materials and sell them back to foundries like factories and others of the like. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community.  He earns a minimum of Php1000 in sales every day.

To help him continue operations of his business, he is requesting a Php,50, 000 loan. He will be incorporating the loan on his current revolving fund used to buy recyclable materials from collectors. 

Erwin dreams to have his own equipment and hopes to give his family a good future. He meets up with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his life and business every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and from the Word of God he studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for recyclable materials

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 29 years old and single with two children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, such as shampoo and groceries. Elizabeth has been in this business for one year.

In the future, Elizabeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, groceries and other items to sell.

loans.name: Souy's Group

texts.en:
Souy is a 52-year-old woman who lives with her husband in a rural village of the Moung Russey district. Rice farming is the primary source of income for her family for the past fifteen years. The current business earns her family about 35,000 KHR per day, but she is able to save 17,000 KHR each day.

This is the seventh loan for Souy with VisionFund. She is now leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Souy wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Sopha's Group

texts.en:
Sopha is a citizen from a rural village located in the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district. She is 30 years old and married with a young daughter. For the last several years, she has been farming rice to support her family. With the current business, she can earn about KHR 40,000 per day and can save about KHR 20,000 each day for future needs.

Sopha has been a member of VisionFund for one cycle. She completely repaid her loan, which has enabled her to better support her family. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Sopha is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice fruitfully so as to sell if for a good price. This will improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Yan's Group

texts.en:
A 55-year-old mother of four children, Yan resides in a rural village of the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Cambodia. To support her living, she has been growing pineapple in the village for 18 years while her husband works for others for a fee. Together, they can earn about KHR 45,000 per day from the current business and can save about KHR 25,000 each day for their future needs.

This is the fourth loan for Yan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now, she is leading her group to ask for a loan. Yan, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy more pineapple seeds for growing. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase the income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy more pineapple seeds for growing.

loans.name: Digna Amada

texts.es:
En San Jacinto  del cantón Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Bankito La Y. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros,  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.
En este lugar vive la señora Digna, tiene 47 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 29, 23 y 18 años, los dos menores viven en su casa, la menor recién termino sus estudios en el colegio y espera seguir en universidad. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca y comercio de pescado.
Doña Digna realiza el crédito para que su marido lo utilice en sus actividades, el en ciertos días a la semana se va en una pequeña panga a realizar sus faenas de pesca pero cuando regresa el recoge lo que hayan pescado él y otras personas, luego con todo ese pescado viaja hasta Santo Domingo lugar donde entrega a comerciantes en dicha ciudad, estos viajes lo realiza con su esposa que siempre le acompaña y le ayuda en las ventas y limpieza del pescado, para esto ellos fletan un carro para que les realice el transporte, es así como llevan toda la vida luchando para darles a su familia un hogar estable. 
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pescado, materiales y combustible para la pesca. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde el inicio  y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido salir adelante. Sus sueños son tener un carro propio para llevar el pescado.
texts.en:
The credit group “Bankito La Y” meets every 15 days in San Jacinto, in the canton of Tosagua.  This is a place that is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited by many tourists, both foreign and domestic. It offers a diversity of beautiful places and a rich variety of typical regional dishes. 

Señora Digna lives here. She is 47 years old and she lives with her partner, with whom she has three children, ages 29, 23, and 18.  The two youngest live at home, and her youngest daughter recently finished high school and hopes to go on to college. Her husband works as a commercial fisherman.

Doña Digna is seeking a loan so that her husband can use it for his work. On certain days of the week he goes out in a small boat to fish; but when he returns he gathers up whatever he and other people have caught, and travels to Santo Domingo, where he delivers the fish to markets in the city. He makes these trips with his wife, who always accompanies him, helping him with the sales and cleaning of the fish, which they transport by renting a car. This is the way that they spend their lives: striving to give their family a stable home. 

She will use the loan to purchase fish, supplies, and fuel for fishing. She has been in the credit group since the beginning and she likes it because the loans have enabled her to move forward. Her dream is to have her own car for transporting the fish.

loans.use: to purchase fish, supplies, and fuel for fishing.

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.ru:
Илхомджон молодой успешный бизнесмен, он занимается куплей продажей скота. Его отец и мать пенсионеры, они помогают в развитии бизнеса своего отца. Илхомчон  еще не женат , но у него есть планы в этом году завести семью. Его родители хотят что бы  Илхомджон женился на хорошей девушки , что бы она ухаживала за ними и помогала по  хозяйстве маме. Но Илхомджон хочет накопить на свадьбу и расширить свой бизнес, чтобы в будущем обеспечить свою семью. Также старается для своих родителей и  обеспечить им счастливую старость. 
Для того что бы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Илхомчон и его отец перепродают скот.  На данный момент у них недостаточно средств  что бы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. Для этого он посоветовавшись с родителями  обратился в Арванд, что бы получить кредит для увеличения поголовья скота. Илхомджон и его родители благодарны  Арванду за то  что,имеют возможность получить кредит и что Илхомджон не будет просить у своих родственников и знакомых, так как в их местности это не прилично и не принято. Он очень благодарен что получит необходимую сумму и сможет развивать бизнес со своим отцом.
texts.en:
Ilhom is a young and successful businessman who works buying and selling livestock. His parents are retired and help their son with his business. Ilhom is not yet married, but he has plans to start a family this year. His parents want him to marry a nice girl so she can take care of them and help his mother around the house. But Ilhom wants to save up for a wedding and expand his business so that in the future he can provide for his family and provide his parents with a happy retirement too.

To earn regular income, Ilhom and his father resell cattle. At the moment they don't have enough money to cover all of their costs. For this reason he consulted with his parents and turned to Arvand in order to receive a loan to increase the number of livestock he has. Ilhom and his parents are thankful to Arvand for giving them the possibility of receiving a loan so that Ilhom won't have to ask his family and friends, since in their region this is neither appropriate nor acceptable. He is very thankful to receive the necessary sum so that he can develop the business with his father.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Loeurb's Group

texts.en: Loeurb, 30, is a villager from the Moung Russrey district of Battambang province and a mother of four children. Currently, two of her children are in school and the two remaining are too young for schooling. She feeds her entire family via her rice, corn and cassava plantation, as it is her main source of income. She works at a paid working job to earn additional income. She has been in this business for 10 years and it has returned her a decent income. This is the seventh-cycle loan for her with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has completely repaid her past loans and has wisely used her past loans to improve her lifestyle. Now, she leads a group of two to get a new loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan to buy corn seeds and to pay a plowing fee. She hopes that she will collect a higher crop yield than before.

loans.use: To buy corn seeds and to pay the plowing fee

loans.name: Exaltación De La Cruz

texts.es:
Exaltación de 44 años de edad, no tiene muchos  años de educación, estudio  hasta 6º grado es casado su esposa le ayuda en su negocio cuando no trabaja de albañil,sus 3 hijos viven con ellos van a la escuela.


El negocio de él, es venta de especias,comino,canela chan, pimienta, achote etc,su padre le inculco este negocio ya que toda su familia trabajan así y  debido al a la necesidad de crecer a sus hijos y darles una mejor vida,el negocio lo tiene en el centro de la ciudad,  viaja en microbus, sus hijos y  su esposa le apoyan en su negocio.


El préstamo lo necesita para comprar por mayor especias, achote,comino etc.y de esa forma mejorar mas sus ingresos y su familia estará mejor y la necesidad quedara sastisfecha.

El sueño u objetivo de él, es siempre tener su negocio y que le genere  mejores ingresos para mantener a su familia y eso lo lograra porque seguirá trabajando con la institución.
texts.en:
Exaltación is 44 years old. He doesn't have many years of education. He went to school through 6th grade. He is married. His wife helps him in his business when he is not working as a mason. Their three children live with them and go to school.

His business is selling spices such as cumin, cinnamon, pepper, achiote, etc. His father taught him this business, since all his family works in it, and due to the need to raise his children and give them a better life, he has a business in the center of the city. He travels there by microbus. His wife and children help him in his business.

He needs the loan to buy wholesale spices such as achiote, cumin, etc., and in this way improve his income, so that his family will be better off and their needs will be satisfied.

His dream and goal for himself is to always have his business and to have it generate better income to maintain his family, and he will achieve this because he will continue working with this institution.

loans.use: to buy wholesale spices, such as achiote, cumin, etc.

loans.name: Nat

texts.en:
A resident from a rural village in the Cheung Prey district, Nat is a 31-year-old mother of two children. The main sources of her family’s income are from rice farming on a two-hectare farmland and from raising ducks, which she has been doing for 13 years. With her current business, she can earn about KHR 37,000 per day to spend for her daily expenses.
 
This is the first loan for Nat with VisionFund. Now she is applying for a loan of 3,000,000 KHR to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her income and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Sivorn

texts.en:
Living in a thatched roof house in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Sivorn is 23 years old and married. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice and planting cassava and they have been in this business for two years.
